src: La pel·lícula, protagonitzada Ryan Gosling i Emma Stone, va rebre nominacions en totes les categories principals. Gosling i Stone van rebre nominacions al millor actor i la millor actriu, respectivament. Entre les altres nominacions estan les de millor pel·lícula, director, fotografia, disseny de vestuari, muntatge de pel·lícula, banda sonora, disseny de producció, edició de so, mescla de so i guió original. Dues de les cançons de la pel·lícula, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) i City of Stars, van rebre nominacions per a la millor cançó original. L'estudi Lionsgate va rebre 26 nominacions  més que qualsevol altre estudi.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Best Actress, respectively. Among the other nominations are Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two of the film's songs, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars", received nominations for Best Original Song. The studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations  more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: La NHK també ha informat que la central nuclear de Kashiwazaki Kariwa, a la prefectura de Niigata, funcionava amb normalitat. La companyia elèctrica de Hokoriku ha informat que el terratrèmol no ha tingut conseqüències i que han apagat els reactors número 1 i 2 a la seva planta nuclear de Shika. S'ha informat que devers 9.400 cases de la zona romanen sense aigua i aproximadament 100, sense electricitat. S'han fet malbé algunes carreteres, el servei de ferrocarril s'ha interromput en les zones afectades i l'Aeroport de Noto a la prefectura d'Ishikawa es manté tancat.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokoriku Electric Power Company reported that the earthquake had no effect and that they had shut down reactors 1 and 2 at their Shika nuclear power plant. It was reported that about 9,400 homes in the area were without water and about 100 without electricity. Some roads were damaged, train service was suspended in the affected areas and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remained closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: El document, segons la filtració, farà referència a la disputa fronterera, que Palestina vol establir segons les fronteres d'abans de la guerra de l'Orient Mitjà de 1967. Entre els altres assumptes tractats, segons consta, hi ha el futur estat de Jerusalem, que és sagrat per a ambdues nacions, i la disputa de la Vall del Jordà. Israel exigeix una presència militar ininterrompuda a la vall durant deu anys un cop s'hagi signat un acord, mentre que l'AP només es compromet a acceptar-la durant cinc anys.
mt: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the border dispute, which Palestine wants to establish according to the pre-1967 Middle East War borders. Among the other issues addressed, according to the document, are the future state of Jerusalem, which is sacred to both nations, and the dispute over the Jordan Valley. Israel demands an uninterrupted military presence in the valley for ten years after a deal is signed, while the AP only commits to accepting it for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Nascut a Hong Kong, Ma va estudiar a la Universitat de Nova York i a l'Escola de Dret de Harvard i durant un temps va tenir un permís de residència permanent als Estats Units. Hsieh insinuà durant les eleccions que Ma podria escapar del país en temps de crisi. Hsieh també va a argumentar que el fotogènic Ma era més estil que no pas substància. Malgrat aquestes acusacions, Ma va guanyar còmodament en una plataforma que demanava una unió més forta amb la Xina continental.
mt: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and at one time had a permanent resident permit in the United States. Hsieh insinuated during the elections that Ma could escape the country in times of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won comfortably on a platform that called for a stronger union with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Després que es fes evident que moltes famílies cercaven ajuda legal per a lluitar contra els desnonaments, es va celebrar una reunió el 20 de març al Centre de Dret Comunitari d'East Bay per les víctimes d'estafa en l'habitatge. Quan els llogaters van començar a parlar del que els havia passat, la majoria de les famílies que estaven implicades es va adonar que Carolyn Wilson, de l'Oakland Housing Authority, els havia robat els dipòsits de garantia i havia fugit de la ciutat. Els llogaters a Lockwood Gardens creuen que hi pot haver altres 40 famílies o més que s'hagin d'enfrontar a desnonaments, perquè han sabut que la policia OHA també està investigant altres propietats d'habitatge públic a Oakland que poden haver estat objecte de l'estafa.
mt: After it became evident that many families were seeking legal help to fight evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for victims of housing fraud. When tenants began to talk about what had happened, most of the families involved realized that Carolyn Wilson, of the Oakland Housing Authority, had stolen their security deposits and fled the city. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe there may be another 40 families or more who will have to face evictions, because they have learned that the OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may have been victims of the fraud.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Després de la carrera, Keselowski roman el líder del Campionat dels Pilots amb 2.250 punts. Johnson és segon amb 2.243, set punts per darrere del seu oponent. En tercera posició, Hamlin es troba vint punts per darrere, però cinc per davant de Bowyer. Kahne i Truex, Jr. són cinquè i sisè respectivament amb 2.220 i 2.207 punts. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, i Harvick completen les deu millors posicions del Campionat de Pilots quan queden quatre curses aquesta temporada.
mt: After the race, Keselowski remains the leader in the Drivers' Championship with 2,250 points. Johnson is second with 2,243, seven points behind his opponent. In third place, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick complete the top ten positions in the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining this season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Es creu que és la cinquena vegada en la història que la gent ha vist el que després s'ha confirmat químicament de ser material marcià caient a la Terra. Dels aproximadament 24.000 meteorits coneguts que han caigut a la Terra, només s'ha verificat que uns 34 són d'origen marcià. Quinze d'aquestes roques s'atribueixen a la pluja de meteors del juliol passat. Algunes d'aquestes roques, que són molt rares a la Terra, es venen per 11.000-22.500 dòlars per unça, uns deus cop més que el preu de l'or.
mt: It is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have seen what was later chemically confirmed to be Martian material falling to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 meteorites known to have fallen to Earth, only 34 have been confirmed to be of Martian origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the July meteor shower. Some of these rocks, which are very rare on Earth, sell for $11,000-$22,500 per ounce, some ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher, que es va retirar l'any 2006 després d'haver guanyat el campionat de Fórmula 1 en set ocasions, havia de substituir el lesionat Felipe Massa. El brasiler va sofrir una contusió encefàlica severa després d'un accident durant el Gran Premi d'Hongria del 2009. Es preveu que Massa en romangui fora almenys durant la resta de temporada 2009.
mt: Schumacher, who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula One championship seven times, was to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a severe concussion after an accident during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is expected to remain out for the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: AOL ha estat capaç de moure i desenvolupar el mercat de missatgeria instantània al seu propi ritme fins ara, gràcies a la seva popularitat als Estats Units. Assolit aquest acord, podria acabar-se aquesta llibertat. El motiu és que la suma total d'usuaris de Yahoo! i dels serveis de Microsoft podrien rivalitzar amb el nombre de clients d'AOL.
mt: AOL has been able to move and develop the instant messaging market at its own pace so far, thanks to its popularity in the United States. Reaching this agreement, this freedom could end. The reason is that the total number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services could rival the number of AOL clients.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Ahir al matí va explotar un cotxe bomba a la seu de la policia de Gaziantep, Turquia, i va provocar la mort de dos policies i va ferir més de vint persones. L'oficina del governador afirma que dinou dels ferits eren agents de policia. La policia ha dit que sospiten que un presumpte militant de Daesh (ISIL) sigui responsable de l'atac.
mt: Yesterday morning a car bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty people. The governor's office says that nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police say they suspect a suspected Daesh (ISIL) militant is responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: "L'antic governador de Massachusetts Mitt Romney va guanyar les eleccions primàries presidencials del Partit Republicà de Florida el dimarts amb més d'un 46 per cent del vot. L'antic President de la Cambra dels Representats dels EUA Newt Gingrich va acabar segon amb el 32 per cent. Regit pel principi de ""tot per al guanyador"", l'estat de Florida va aportar tots els seus cinquanta delegats a Romney, portant-lo al capdavant de la nominació del Partit Republicà."
mt: "Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's Florida primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich finished second with 32 percent. Under the ""winner-take-all"" principle, Florida awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, putting him ahead in the Republican Party's nomination."
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "L'anterior president de la Cambra Newt Gingrich, el governador de Texas Rick Perry i la parlamentària Michele Bachmann han acabat en quarta, cinquena i sisena posició, respectivament. Amb l'arribada dels resultats, Gingrich va elogiar Santorum, però tingué dures paraules per a Romney, en nom del qual es van emetre a Iowa anuncis de campanya negatius contra Gingrich. Perry va dir que tornaria ""a Texas per a valorar els resultats del comitè d'aquesta nit i veure si hi ha un camí per endavant per a mi en aquesta cursa"", però més tard digué que es mantindria en la cursa i que competiria en les primàries de Carolina del Sud el 21 de gener. Bachmann, que va guanyar l'Ames Straw Poll a l'agost, ha decidit donar per acabada la seva campanya."
mt: "The previous House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann have ended in fourth, fifth and sixth place, respectively. With the arrival of the results, Gingrich praised Santorum, but had harsh words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign ads were aired against Gingrich. Perry said he would return ""to Texas to evaluate the results of this committee tonight and see if there is a way forward for me in this race"", but later said he would stay in the race and compete in the South Carolina primaries on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, has decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "La pàgina web de l'emissora descriu el programa com ""un ràdio-teatre de la vella escola amb un nou i escandalós gir extravagant!"" Durant els seus inicis, el programa només s'emetia a la històrica cadena de ràdio en línia TogiNet Radio, especialitzada en ràdio parlada. Cap a finals de 2015, TogiNet va establir AstroNet com una estació filial. El programa inicialment incloïa actors de veu aficionats, provinents del Texas oriental."
mt: "The station's website describes the program as ""a radio-theater of the old school with a new and scandalous extravagant twist!"" In its early days, the program was only broadcast on the historic TogiNet Radio, a spoken word radio station specializing in radio drama. By the end of 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet as a sister station. The program initially included amateur voice actors, originating from eastern Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: "La pàgina web de l'emissora descriu el programa com ""un ràdio-teatre de la vella escola amb un nou i escandalós gir extravagant!"" Durant els seus inicis, el programa només s'emetia a la històrica cadena de ràdio en línia TogiNet Radio, especialitzada en ràdio parlada. Cap a finals de 2015, TogiNet va establir AstroNet com una estació filial. El programa inicialment incloïa actors de veu aficionats, provinents del Texas oriental."
mt: "The station's website describes the program as ""a radio-theater of the old school with a new and scandalous extravagant twist!"" In its early days, the program was only broadcast on the historic TogiNet Radio, a spoken word radio station specializing in radio drama. By the end of 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet as a sister station. The program initially included amateur voice actors, originating from eastern Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Els atacants de Bombai van arribar en vaixell el 26 de novembre de 2008, portant amb ells granades i armes automàtiques. Van atacar diversos objectius, entre ells la concorreguda estació de tren Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus i el famós hotel Taj Mahal. La cerca i anàlisi d'informació de David Headley va ajudar els 10 homes armats del grup militant pakistanès Laskhar-e-Taiba a activar l'operació. L'atac va sobrecarregar les relacions entre l'Índia i el Pakistan.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers arrived by boat, carrying grenades and automatic weapons. They attacked several targets, including the crowded train station Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus and the famous hotel Taj Mahal. The search and analysis of information by David Headley helped the 10 armed men of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba to activate the operation. The attack strained relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "El rècord de Nadal conta el canadenc és de 7-2. Ha perdut recentment contra Raonic a l'Open de Brisbane. Nadal va aconseguir un 88% de punts nets en el partit, guanyant 76 punts amb el primer servei. Després del partit, el rei de la terra batuda va dir, ""estic simplement emocionat d'haver tornat a les rondes finals dels esdevniments més importants. Sóc aquí per a intentar guanyar""."
mt: "Nadal's record against the Canadian is 7-2. He has recently lost to Raonic at the Brisbane Open. Nadal achieved an 88% net points in the match, winning 76 points with the first serve. After the match, the king of clay said, ""I'm just excited to have returned to the finals of the most important events. I'm here to try to win."""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: La setmana passada, Naked News va anunciar un increment considerable del seu compromís amb les notícies en idiomes internacionals, amb tres programes nous. L'organització mundial ja està informant en anglès i japonès, i està llançant programes en castellà, italià i coreà per a la televisió, la web i els dispositius mòbils.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced a significant increase in its commitment to international news, with three new programs. The global organization is already reporting in English and Japanese, and is launching programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, the web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: "Més enllà de l'esdeveniment de dimecres, Carpanedo va competir en 2 curses individuals al Campionat. La primera va ser l'eslàlom, en què va obtenir un ""No finalitzada"" a la primera volta. Trenta-sis dels 116 competidors restants van acabar amb el mateix resultat. L'altra carrera en què va participar, l'eslàlom gegant, la va acabar en desena posició del grup de dones assegudes, amb un temps combinat de totes les voltes de 4:41,30; 2:11,60 minuts més lenta que la primera a acabar, l'austríaca Claudia Loesch, i 1:09,02 minuts més lenta que la novena classificada, Gyöngyi Dani, d'Hongria. Quatre esquiadores del grup femení d'assegudes no acabaren les seves curses, i 45 del total de 117 esquiadors de l'eslàlom gegant no aconseguiren classificar-se en la cursa."
mt: "Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. The first was the slalom, in which she obtained a ""Did not finish"" on the first lap. Thirty-six of the remaining 116 competitors finished with the same result. The other race in which she participated, the giant slalom, she finished in tenth place in the seated women's group, with a combined time for all laps of 4:41.30; 2:11.60 minutes slower than the first to finish, Claudia Loesch of Austria, and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth-placed, Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers from the seated women's group did not finish their races, and 45 of the total 117 skiers in the giant slalom did not qualify for the race."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: L'Associació Nacional de Bàsquet dels Estats Units (NBA) va suspendre dimecres la seva temporada de bàsquet professional a causa del temor a la Covid-19. La decisió de l'NBA arriba després que un jugador de l'Utah Jazz hagi resultat positiu en una prova pel virus de la COVID-19.
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season on Wednesday due to fear of Covid-19. The NBA's decision comes after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: El jugador del dia d'avui és Alex Ovechkin, dels Washington Capitals. Va fer 2 gols i 2 assistències en la victòria 5 a 3 de Washington contra els Atlanta Thrashers. La primera assistència de la nit d'Ovechkin va ser en el gol guanyador del joc pel novell Nicklas Backstrom; el seu segon gol de la nit va ser el 60è de la temporada, esdevenint el primer jugador a fer 60 o més gols en una temporada des del 1995-96 ençà, quan tant Jaromir Jagr com Mario Lemieux van assolir aquesta fita.
mt: Today's player is Alex Ovechkin, of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since the 1995-96 season, when both Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished this feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "El banc Northern Rock s'havia nacionalitzat l'any 2008 després que se sabés que la companyia havia rebut ajuda d'emergència per part del govern del Regne Unit. Northern Rock havia demanat ajuda per la seva exposició durant la crisi de les hipoteques ""subprime"" de l'any 2007. Al Virgin Group de Sir Richard Branson li van rebutjar la licitació del banc abans que fos nacionalitzat. L'any 2010, en el procés de nacionalització, l'actual banc comercial Northern Rock plc es va escindir del ""banc dolent"" Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin només ha comprat el 'bon banc' de Northern Rock, no l'empresa d'administració d'actius."
mt: "The Northern Rock bank had been nationalized in 2008 after it was known that the company had received emergency help from the government of the United Kingdom. Northern Rock had requested help for its exposure during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. The Virgin Group of Sir Richard Branson was rejected in the bidding for the bank before it was nationalized. In 2010, in the process of nationalization, the current commercial bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ""bad bank"" Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the 'good bank' of Northern Rock, not the asset management company."
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: La decisió del Sr. Rudd de signar l'acord pel clima de Kyoto aïlla els Estats Units, que ara seran l'única nació desenvolupada que no el ratifica. L'anterior govern conservador d'Austràlia va refusar de ratificar el Protocol de Kyoto, argumentant que faria mal a l'economia amb la seva important dependència de l'exportació de carbó, mentre que països com Índia o la Xina no estaven obligats a assolir els objectius d'emissions.
mt: The decision by Mr Rudd to sign the Kyoto climate change agreement isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. The previous conservative Australian government refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol, arguing that it would harm the economy with its important dependence on coal exports, while countries such as India or China were not required to meet emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Els caçadors a la prova pilot de control de plagues suplementària havien de ser supervisats de prop pels guardes forestals, en tant que la prova pilot es monitorava i se n'avaluava l'eficàcia. En una associació de NPWS i l'Associació de Tiradors Esportius d'Austràlia (NSW) Inc., es van reclutar voluntaris qualificats, sota el programa de caça Associació de l'Associació de Tiradors Esportius. Segons Mick O'Flynn, el director Interí del Parc de Conservació i Patrimoni amb el NPWS, els quatre caçadors seleccionats per a la primera operació de caça reberen una formació de seguretat i entrenament adequada.
mt: The supplementary plague control test shooters were to be closely supervised by forest rangers, as the test shoot was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In an association of NPWS and the NSW Sporting Shooters Association Inc., qualified volunteers were recruited under the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the interim director of the Conservation and Heritage Park with the NPWS, the four selected shooters for the first shooting operation received appropriate safety and training.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Basant-nos en aquest fòssil, això implica que la separació va ocórrer força abans del que s'havia anticipat amb proves moleculars. Això implica que tot s'ha de tornar a revisar, ha dit l'investigador al Rift Valley Research Service a Etiòpia i coautor de l'estudi, Berhane Asfaw.
mt: Based on this fossil, this implies that the split occurred much earlier than anticipated with molecular studies. This implies that everything needs to be re-evaluated, said the researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: En la presentació principal de dijous del Tokyo Game Show, el president de Nintendo Satoru Iwata va revelar el disseny del comandament de la Nintendo Revolution, la nova consola de la companyia. De forma similar al comandament d'un televisor, el control fa servir 2 sensors col·locats prop del televisor de l'usuari per a triangular la seva ubicació en 3 dimensions. Això permetrà als jugadors controlar les accions i els moviments als videojocs movent el dispositiu en l'aire.
mt: In the main presentation of Thursday's Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata revealed the design of the Nintendo Revolution's controller, the company's new console. Similar to a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its location in three dimensions. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Abans l'agència de notícies xinesa Xinhua havia informat del segrest de l'avió. Informes posteriors van declarar aleshores que l'avió havia rebut una amenaça de bomba i que es va desviar de tornada a l'Afganistan, aterrant a Kandahar. Les primeres informacions diuen que l'avió s'havia desviat de tornada a l'Afganistan després que li fos negat un aterratge d'emergència a Ürümqi.
mt: Before the Chinese news agency Xinhua had reported the plane's hijacking. Later reports then declared the plane had received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing at Kandahar. Initial reports say the plane had diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing at Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Dilluns, Sara Danius, secretària permanent del Comitè del Nobel per la Literatura de l'Acadèmia Sueca, va anunciar públicament a Suècia en un programa de ràdio a la Sveriges Radio que el comitè havia cessat els esforços per localitzar Bob Dylan després de no aconseguir posar-se en contacte directe amb ell arran de la seva victòria del Premi Nobel de la Literatura 2016. Danius va dir: ""Ara mateix no estem fent res. He trucat i enviat correus electrònics al seu col·laborador de més confiança i he rebut respostes molt amables. De moment, això és suficient."""
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature of the Swedish Academy, announced publicly in Sweden on a radio program at Sveriges Radio that the committee had ceased efforts to locate Bob Dylan after failing to directly contact him following his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature win. Danius said: "Right now we're not doing anything. I've called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and have received very polite responses. For now, that's enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "El president dels Estats Units, George W. Bush, va celebrar l'anunci. El portaveu de Bush, Gordon Johndroe, va qualificar la promesa de Corea del Nord de ""gran pas cap a l'objectiu d'assolir la desnuclearització verificable de la península de Corea""."
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush celebrated the announcement. Bush's spokesman, Gordon Johndroe, called the North Korean promise ""a great step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.""
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "L'any 1956, S?ania es va mudar a Suècia, on tres anys més tard va començar a treballar per a l'oficina postal sueca i va esdevenir el seu gravador en cap. Va produir més de 1.000 estampes per a Suècia i 28 altres països. El seu treball té una qualitat i detalls tan reconeixibles que és un dels pocs ""noms coneguts"" entre els filatèlics. N'hi ha alguns que s'especialitzen a col·leccionar només les seves obres. El seu segell número 1.000 va ser el magnífic ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" de David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl el 2000, que figura al Llibre Guinness de Rècords Mundials. També estava involucrat en el gravat de bitllets per a molts països, i entre els exemples recents de la seva feina hi ha els retrats dels primers ministres que figuren als nous bitllets de 5 $ i 100 $ canadencs."
mt: 1956, S?ania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began working for the Swedish postal office and became its chief engraver. He produced more than 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work has a quality and details so recognizable that he is one of the few ""known names"" among philatelists. There are some who specialize in collecting only his works. His stamp number 1,000 was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also involved in the engraving of banknotes for many countries, and among recent examples of his work are the portraits of the prime ministers that appear on the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Es van tancar 800 milles del sistema de canonades Trans-Alaska després d'un vessament de milers de barrils de petroli cru al sud de Fairbanks, Alaska. Una apagada després d'una prova rutinària del sistema antiincendis va provocar que les vàlvules d'alleujament s'obrissin i es desbordés petroli brut prop de l'estació de bombament 9 de Fort Greely. L'obertura de les vàlvules va alliberar pressió del sistema i el petroli va fluir sobre un coixí cap a un dipòsit que pot emmagatzemar 55.000 barrils (2,3 milions de galons). Cap al dimecres a la tarda, les obertures del tanc encara gotejaven probablement de l'expansió tèrmica dins seu. Una segona zona de conteniment sota els tancs amb capacitat per a 104.500 barrils encara no era plena.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska pipeline was shut down after a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A shutoff after a routine test of the pipeline's fire suppression system caused the relief valves to open and crude oil spilled near Pump Station 9 at Fort Greely. The opening of the valves relieved pressure from the system and the oil flowed over a berm to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). By Wednesday afternoon, the tank openings were still dripping likely from thermal expansion inside it. A second containment area under the tanks with a capacity of 104,500 barrels was not yet full.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: El Cos d'Enginyers dels EUA ha estimat que una pluja de 6 polzades podria trencar els dics que s'han danyat prèviament. El Ninth Ward, que patí inundacions de fins a 20 peus durant l'Huracà Katrina, es troba sota aigües que arriben a la cintura després que l'aigua hagi sobrepassat el dic proper. L'aigua sobresurt per fora del dic a una secció de 100 metres d'amplada.
mt: The United States Army Corps of Engineers has estimated that a 6-inch rain could break the levees that have been damaged previously. The Ninth Ward, which suffered up to 20-foot flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is under chest-deep water after the water has overtopped the nearby levee. Water is spilling over the levee in a 100-meter section.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton va confirmat que l'Hospital Universitari de Howard havia admès que el pacient es trobava en estat estable. El pacient havia estat a Nigèria, on s'han donat alguns casos del virus Ebola. L'hospital ha seguit el protocol de control d'infeccions, inclòs l'aïllament del pacient per a prevenir possibles infeccions a d'altres.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that Howard University Hospital had admitted that the patient was in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have been reported. The hospital followed infection control protocol, including isolating the patient to prevent possible infections to others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Els cometes podrien haver estat una font d'aigua enviada a la terra juntament amb matèria orgànica que pot formar proteïnes i mantenir la vida. Els científics esperen entendre com es formen els planetes, sobretot com es va formar la Terra, d'ençà que uns cometes van col·lidir amb la Terra fa molt temps.
mt: Comets may have been a source of water sent to Earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and maintain life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since some comets collided with the Earth a long time ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Tot i que les autoritats desconfien de la credibilitat de l'amenaça, l'Autoritat del Transport de Maryland ha procedit al tancament a instàncies de l'FBI. S'han usat camions de les escombraries per a blocar les entrades del túnel i s'ha disposat de l'assistència de 80 policies per a desviar els automobilistes. No es van reportar grans demores de trànsit a la carretera de circunvalació, la ruta alternativa de la ciutat.
mt: Though authorities doubt the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority has proceeded to close the tunnel at the request of the FBI. Garbage trucks have been used to block the entrances of the tunnel and 80 police officers have been deployed to divert traffic. There were no major delays on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "El fotògraf va ser traslladat al Ronal Reagan UCLA Medical Center, on posteriorment va morir. Afirmen que tenia uns vint anys. En un comunicat, Bieber va dir: ""tot i que jo no hi era presencialment ni estava directament implicat en aquest tràgic accident, els meus pensaments i pregàries són amb la família de la víctima"". El lloc web de notícies d'entreteniment TMZ entén que el fotògraf va aturar el seu vehicle a l'altra banda del Sepulvead Boulevard i va intentar fer fotos de l'aturada de policia abans de travessar la carretera i seguir, fent aturar l'oficial de policia de la California Highway Patrol que dirigia el trànsit per a ordenar-li que tornàs a rere, dos cops. Segons la policia, el conductor del vehicle que va envestir el fotògraf probablement no assumirà càrrecs criminals."
mt: "The photographer was taken to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was said to be in his twenties. In a statement, Bieber said: "Although I was not physically present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my prayers and thoughts go out to the family of the victim, the driver of the car, and all of those who were involved. I would like to ask all the media and the fans to please respect [the victim's] family's privacy during this difficult time. I am not legally blamed at all, but I am very sorry for what has occurred. This is an unthinkable tragedy. I would like to especially thank the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department for their great care and deeds." The entertainment news website TMZ understands that the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of the Sepulvead Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, causing the California Highway Patrol officer directing traffic to order him to return, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Segons el ministre de la presidència Rodrigo Arias, Arias ha resultat positiu a un cas lleu del virus. L'estat del president és estable, així i tot, es quedarà aïllat a casa uns quants de dies. Apart de la febre i el mal de coll, em trobo bé i en bona forma per fer la meva feina des de casa. Compto en reprendre totes les meves obligacions dilluns, ha dit Arias en unes declaracions.
mt: According to the minister of the presidency Rodrigo Arias, Arias has tested positive for a mild case of the virus. The president's condition is stable, however, he will remain isolated at home for a few days. Apart from the fever and sore throat, I am well and in good shape to do my work from home. I count on resuming all my obligations on Monday, Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: El Cicló Tropical Gonu, anomenat així per una bossa de fulles de palma en la llengua de les Maldives, va assolir vents sostinguts de 240 quilòmetres per hora (149 milles per hora) al seu màxim. A primeres hores d'avui els vents eren de 83 km/h i s'espera que segueixin perdent força.
mt: Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named after a palm frond in the Maldives language, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour) at its peak. Early today winds were 83 km/h and are expected to continue weakening.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: La marea roja la causa una concentració superior a l'habitual de Karenia brevis, un organisme marí unicel·lular natural. Els factors naturals poden creuar-se per a produir condicions ideals, permetent que aquestes algues augmentin en nombre dramàticament. Les algues produeixen una neurotoxina que poden inhabilitar nervis tant en els humans com en els peixos. Els peixos sovint moren a causa de les elevades concentracions de la toxina en l'aigua. Els humans es poden veure afectats per la inhalació d'aigua afectada que arriba a l'aire a través del vent i les ones.
mt: The red tide is caused by an abnormally high concentration of Karenia brevis, a natural single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can cross to produce ideal conditions, allowing these algae to dramatically increase in number. The algae produce a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die due to the high concentrations of the toxin in the water. Humans can be affected by inhaling water-affected air that comes to the air through the wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, qui fou una tempesta de categoria 4 en l'escala dels huracans de Saffir-Simpson, es va afeblir en un cicló tropical abans de dissipar-se dimarts. Les seves restes han provocat ruixats a la majoria de les illes, però fins ara no s'ha notificat danys o inundacions. La pluja, que va assolir 6,34 polzades en una galga d'Oahu, va ser definida com a ""beneficiosa"". Algunes de les pluges venien acompanyades de tempestes i llamps freqüents."
mt: "Felicia, who was a category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, weakened into a tropical cyclone before dissipating on Tuesday. Its remnants have caused showers on most of the islands, but no damage or flooding has been reported so far. The rain, which reached 6.34 inches on a gauge on Oahu, was defined as ""beneficial"". Some of the rain came with frequent thunderstorms and lightning."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. es va estavellar al Gran Premi de Singapur del 2008 immediatament després d'una aturada tècnica anticipada de Fernando Alonso, traient el cotxe de seguretat. Quan els cotxes de davant d'Alonso van entrar per fer provisió de combustible sota el cotxe de seguretat, ell els va avançar per aconseguir la victòria. Piquet Jr. fou acomiadat després del Gran Premi d'Hongria del 2009.
mt: Piquet Jr. crashed at the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix immediately after an early pit stop by Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. When the cars ahead of Alonso entered the pit lane to refuel under the safety car, he passed them to take the win. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Un estudi publicat dijous en la revista Science descrivia la formació d'una nova espècie d'ocell a les illes equatorianes de Galápagos. Investigadors de la Universitat de Princeton als Estats Units i la Universitat d'Uppsala a Suècia han informat que la nova espècie ha evolucionat en només dues generacions, malgrat que es pensava que calia molt més temps per aquest procés, a causa de l'encreuament entre un pinsà de Darwin, Geospiza fortes (endèmic), i un pinsà de les Galápagos de bec cònic, Geospiza conirostris (forà).
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science described the formation of a new bird species on the equatorial Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden have reported that the new species has evolved in just two generations, despite the belief that much more time was needed for this process, due to crossbreeding between a Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortis (endemic), and a conical-beaked Galápagos finch, Geospiza conirostris (foreign).
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: L'esdeveniment artístic també forma part d'una campanya de l'Ajuntament de Bucarest que pretén rellançar la imatge de la capital romanesa com a metròpoli creativa i plena de color. La ciutat serà la primera en l'Europa sud-oriental a acollir CowParade, l'esdeveniment d'art públic més important al món entre juny i agost d'enguany.
mt: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the City Hall of Bucharest to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city will be the first in Southeast Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event between June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: L'avió s'havia dirigit cap a Irkutsk i estava operat per tropes interiors. Es va iniciar una investigació. L'Il-76 ha estat un component principal tant del cos militar rus com del soviètic dels anys 1970 ençà, i ja havia patit un accident greu a Rússia el mes passat. Un motor es va separar durant l'enlairament sense provocar ferits el set d'octubre. Rússia va fer aterrar ràpidament els Il-76 després d'aquell accident.
mt: The aircraft was heading to Irkutsk and was operated by the Russian Air Force. An investigation was launched. The Il-76 has been a major component of the Russian military since the 1970s, and had already suffered a major accident in Russia last month. A motor separated during takeoff without injuring anyone on October 7. Russia grounded Il-76s after that accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Abans d'Els Simpson, Simon havia treballat en diferents càrrecs en diversos programes. Va treballar en programes com Taxi, Cheers i The Tracy Ullman Show a la dècada de 1980. L'any 1989 va contribuir a crear Els Simpson juntament amb Brooks i Groening i va ser el responsable de contractar el primer equip de guionistes del programa. Malgrat abandonar el programa l'any 1993, va conservar el títol de productor executiu i va seguir rebent desenes de milions de dòlars per drets d'autor cada temporada.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon had worked in various positions on other shows. He worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers and The Tracy Ullman Show in the 1980s. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons along with Brooks and Groening and was responsible for hiring the first writing staff of the show. Despite leaving the show in 1993, he continued to receive tens of millions of dollars in royalties each season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke escrigué que els esforços d'alguns per a dissuadir les dones de parlar sobre la salut femenina foren frustrats. Va arribar a aquesta conclusió després de rebre molts comentaris positius i encoratjaments tant per part de dones com d'homes que reclamaven que els anticonceptius siguin considerats una necessitat mèdica.
mt: Fluke wrote that efforts by some to dissuade women from talking about women's health were frustrated. She came to this conclusion after receiving many positive and encouraging comments from both women and men who claimed that contraceptives should be considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "Es comportarà com l'aigua. És transparent tal com ho és l'aigua. Així doncs, si fóssiu a la vora de la costa, podríeu veure qualsevol pedra o brutícia que hi hagués al fons. Pel que sabem, hi ha només un cos planetari amb un dinamisme major que el de Tità, i el seu nom és la Terra"", va afegir Stofan."
mt: "It will behave like water. It is transparent like water. So, if you were on the shore of the sea, you could see any rock or debris that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body with a dynamics greater than that of Titan, and its name is the Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: "Es comportarà com l'aigua. És transparent tal com ho és l'aigua. Així doncs, si fóssiu a la vora de la costa, podríeu veure qualsevol pedra o brutícia que hi hagués al fons. Pel que sabem, hi ha només un cos planetari amb un dinamisme major que el de Tità, i el seu nom és la Terra"", va afegir Stofan."
mt: "It will behave like water. It is transparent like water. So, if you were on the shore of the sea, you could see any rock or debris that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body with a dynamics greater than that of Titan, and its name is the Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Això no només confirma que almenys alguns dinosaures tenien plomes, una teoria ja molt estesa, sinó que ofereix detalls que els fòssils normalment no poden oferir, com ara el color i la disposició tridimensional. . Els científics diuen que el plomall d'aquest animal era marró castany a la part de dalt amb un fons de color clar o de carotenoide. La troballa també ofereix una visió de l'evolució de les plomes en ocells. Com que les plomes de dinosaure no tenen un canó ben desenvolupat, anomenat raquis, però sí que tenen altres característiques de les plomes barbes i bàrbules, els investigadors dedueixen que el raquis segurament fou un desenvolupament evolutiu més recent que aquestes altres característiques. L'estructura de les plomes fa pensar que no s'usaven per a volar sinó per a regular la temperatura o per a exhibir-se. Els investigadors han suggerit que, tot i que es tracta de la cua d'un dinosaure jove, la mostra presenta el plomatge d'un adult i no d'un pollet. Els investigadors suggereixen que, tot i que es tracta de la cua d'un dinosaure jove, la mostra revela un plomatge adult, i no pas plomissol.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but also offers details that fossils normally cannot offer, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. The scientists say that the crest of this animal was a light brown at the top with a clear or carotenoid background. The find also offers a view of the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers lack a well-developed quill, called a rachis, but do have other feather characteristics barbs and barbules, the researchers deduce that the rachis was probably a later evolutionary development than these other characteristics. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight but for temperature regulation or display. The researchers have suggested that, although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen reveals the plumage of an adult, not a chick. The researchers suggest that, although it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen reveals an adult plumage, not a downy one.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Tot i que una vacuna experimental sembla que podria reduir la mortalitat de l'Ebola, fins ara, no s'ha pogut demostrar de forma clara que hi hagi medicaments adients per a tractar la infecció existent. Un còctel d'anticossos anomenat ZMapp al principi semblava prometedor, però estudis formals van indicar que tenia menys beneficis dels desitjats per a prevenir la mort. En la prova clínica experimental de PALM, ZMapp es va fer servir com a control i hi van comparar els altres tres tractaments.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to reduce Ebola mortality, so far, there has not been a clear demonstration of effective treatments for existing infection. A cocktail of antibodies called ZMapp initially seemed promising, but formal studies indicated it had less benefits than desired to prevent death. In the PALM clinical trial, ZMapp was used as a control and compared to the other three treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Dilluns, científics de la Facultat de Medicina de la Universitat de Stanford van anunciar la invenció d'una nova eina per fer diagnòstics que pot separar les cèl·lules per tipus: un petit xip que pot ser imprès i fabricat usant impressores d'injecció estàndards per probablement un cèntim americà cadascun. Destacats investigadors diuen que podria facilitar la detecció precoç de casos de càncer, tuberculosi, VIH i malària en països pobres en què la taxa de supervivència davant malalties com el càncer de mama pot arribar a ser la meitat que en països més rics.
mt: On Monday, scientists at the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can separate cells by type: a small chip that can be printed and manufactured using standard injection printers for probably a dollar each. Noted researchers say it could facilitate the early detection of cases of breast cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in poor countries where the survival rate against diseases such as breast cancer can be half that of richer countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: "Els científics han descobert tapats per tota la superfície de la lluna uns accidents geogràfics anomenats ""salts de falla lobulats"" que, segons sembla, són el resultat de l'encongiment molt lent de la lluna. S'han trobat aquests salts de falla arreu de la lluna i semblen haver estat mínimament modificats per la climatologia, la qual cosa indica que els esdeveniments geològics que els van crear han estat força recents. Aquesta teoria contradiu l'afirmació que la lluna es troba totalment absent d'activitat geològica."
mt: "Scientists have discovered hidden all over the surface of the moon some geographical accidents called "lobate scarp" that, it seems, are the result of the very slow shrinking of the moon. These lobate scars have been found all over the moon and seem to have been minimally modified by the climate, which indicates that the geological events that created them have been fairly recent. This theory contradicts the assertion that the moon is totally absent of geological activity."
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Els científics han descobert tapats per tota la superfície de la lluna uns accidents geogràfics anomenats ""salts de falla lobulats"" que, segons sembla, són el resultat de l'encongiment molt lent de la lluna. S'han trobat aquests salts de falla arreu de la lluna i semblen haver estat mínimament modificats per la climatologia, la qual cosa indica que els esdeveniments geològics que els van crear han estat força recents. Aquesta teoria contradiu l'afirmació que la lluna es troba totalment absent d'activitat geològica."
mt: "Scientists have discovered hidden all over the surface of the moon some geographical accidents called "lobate scarp" that, it seems, are the result of the very slow shrinking of the moon. These lobate scars have been found all over the moon and seem to have been minimally modified by the climate, which indicates that the geological events that created them have been fairly recent. This theory contradicts the assertion that the moon is totally absent of geological activity."
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Des de llavors, Adekoya ha estat al Tribunal del Xèrif d'Escòcia imputada amb l'assassinat del seu fill. Es troba sota custòdia pendent d'acusació i judici, però qualsevol testimoni visual podria ser rebutjat perquè la seva imatge s'ha publicat a tot arreu. Això és una pràctica comuna a qualsevol altre indret del Regne Unit, però la justícia escocesa treballa de manera diferent i els tribunals han vist la publicació de fotos com a potencialment perjudicial. La professora Pamela Ferguson de la Universitat de Dundee assenyala que ""els periodistes semblen estar caminant per una línia perillosa si publiquen fotos, etc. dels sospitosos"". L'oficina de la Corona, l'encarregada de les acusacions, ha indicat als periodistes que no farà més declaracions, almenys, fins a la sentència."
mt: "Since then, Adekoya has been at the Scottish Sheriff Court charged with the murder of her son. She is under custody pending trial, but any visual witness could be rejected because her image has been published everywhere. This is a common practice in any other part of the United Kingdom, but Scottish justice works differently and courts have seen the publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee points out that ""journalists seem to be walking a dangerous line if they publish photos, etc. of suspects"". The Crown Office, the body in charge of the accusations, has indicated to journalists that it will not make any more statements, at least, until the verdict."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: A més del gel picat, les condicions del temps extremes han estat dificultant els esforços del rescat. Pittman ha insinuat que les condicions no millorarien fins la setmana que ve. La quantitat i el gruix del paquet de gel, segons Pittman, és el pitjor que ha estat per als segelladors en els darrers 15 anys.
mt: In addition to the broken ice, the extreme weather conditions have been complicating rescue efforts. Pittman has hinted that conditions will not improve until next week. The amount and thickness of the ice pack, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been in the last 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Roberts es va oposar completament a parlar de quan creu que la vida comença, una qüestió important en considerar l'ètica de l'avortament, dient que no seria ètic comentar els detalls de casos probables. Sí que va reiterar, però, la seva afirmació anterior que el cas Roe contra Wade era la ""llei nacional establerta"", fent èmfasi en la importància que les sentències del Tribunal Suprem siguin consistents. També va confirmar que creia en el dret implícit a la privadesa del qual depenia el veredicte del cas Roe."
mt: "Roberts opposed completely talking about when she believes life begins, an important issue in considering the ethics of abortion, saying it would not be ethical to comment on the details of probable cases. She did, however, reiterate her previous assertion that the case Roe v. Wade was the ""established national law"", emphasizing the importance that Supreme Court decisions be consistent. She also confirmed that she believed in the implicit right to privacy on which the Roe decision was based."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Exactament a les 8:46 del matí un silenci va cobrir la ciutat, marcant el moment exacte en què el primer avió va colpejar el seu blanc. S'han arreglat dos rajos de llum perquè apuntin cap al cel durant la nit. Al mateix emplaçament s'estan construint cinc gratacels amb un centre de transports i un parc commemoratiu al mig.
mt: 8:46 am exactly a silence covered the city, marking the exact moment when the first plane hit its target. Two beams of light have been adjusted to point at the sky during the night. At the same place five skyscrapers are being built with a transportation center and a memorial park in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Totes les entrades a les cavernes, que es designaren ""Les Set Germanes"", tenen un diàmetre d'almenys 100 a 250 metres (328 a 820 peus). Les imatges d'infrarojos ens mostren variacions de temperatura diürna i nocturna que demostren que probablement es tracta de coves. Són més fredes que la superfície que les envolta durant el dia, i més calentes durant la nit. El seu comportament tèrmic no és estable com les grans coves a la Terra, que sovint tenen una temperatura força constant, però és coherent amb la hipòtesi que siguin profunds clots al terra, va dir Glen Cushing de l'equip d'astrogeologia United States Geological Survey (USGS) i de la Northern Arizona University ubicada a Flagstaff, a Arizona."
mt: "All the entrances to the caves, which were named "The Seven Sisters", have a diameter of at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet). The infrared images show diurnal and nocturnal temperature variations that show that they are probably caves. They are cooler than the surface that surrounds them during the day, and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not stable like the large caves on Earth, which often have a fairly constant temperature, but is consistent with the hypothesis that they are deep pits on the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."
