src: El presumpte atacant va irrompre entre la multitud amb un vehicle de tres rodes i armat amb explosius. El sospitós de fer esclatar la bomba va ser detingut després d'haver patit lesions a causa de l'explosió. Les autoritats encara no saben el seu nom, tot i que saben que és d'ètnia uigur.
mt: The alleged attacker drove a three-wheeled vehicle into the crowd armed with explosives. The suspect of detonating the bomb was detained after suffering injuries from the explosion. Authorities still do not know his name, although they know he is of Uyghur ethnicity.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Sudàfrica ha vençut als All Blacks (Nova Zelanda) en un partit de rugbi a quinze del Torneig de les Tres Nacions a l'Estadi Royal Bafokeng a Rustenburg, Sudàfrica. La puntuació final fou una victòria d'un punt, 21 a 20, finalitzant la ratxa de 15 victòries dels All Black. Per als Springboks, va acabar una ratxa de cinc partits perduts. Va ser el darrer partit dels All Blacks, que ja havien guanyat el trofeu feia dues setmanes. El partit final d'aquesta sèrie tindrà lloc a Ellis Park a Johannesburg la setmana que ve, quan els Springboks s'enfrontaran a Austràlia.
mt: South Africa defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union fifteen match of the Tri Nations Tournament at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' winning streak of 15 games. For the Springboks, it ended a streak of five games lost. It was the last match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of this series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks will face Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: L'estació va mantenir la seva actitud, tot i la pèrdua d'un giroscopi a la missió de l'estació espacial, fins al final del passeig espacial. Chiao i Sharipov diuen haver estat a una distància de seguretat dels motors d'ajust de la inclinació. El control de terra rus va activar els propulsors i l'estació va recuperar l'altitud normal.
mt: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope on the space station, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov say they were at a safe distance from the attitude control thrusters. The Russian ground control activated the thrusters and the station recovered its normal altitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: El cas fou processat a Virgínia perquè és la seu del proveïdor d'Internet capdavanter AOL, l'empresa que va iniciar els càrrecs. Aquesta és la primera condemna basada en la legislació de 2003 per frenar el correu electrònic massiu, també conegut com a correu brossa, de la distribució no sol·licitada a les safates d'entrada dels usuaris.
mt: The case was processed in Virginia because it is the headquarters of leading Internet provider AOL, the company that filed the charges. This is the first conviction based on the 2003 legislation to curb unsolicited email, also known as spam, of unwanted distribution to users' inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: El Vidal, amb 28 anys i procedent del Sevilla, fou fixtat pel Barça fa tres temporades. D'ençà que es va mudar a la capital catalana, Vidal havia jugat 49 partits pel club.

src: No s'ha emès cap alerta de tsunami i, d'acord amb l'agència geofísica de Jakarta, no se n'emetrà cap, perquè el terratrèmol no ha arribat a la magnitud requerida de 6,5. Malgrat no haver-hi amenaça de tsunami, els residents es van espantar i començaren a desallotjar els seus negocis i habitatges.
mt: No tsunami warning has been issued and, according to the Jakarta Geophysical Agency, none will be, as the earthquake did not reach the required magnitude of 6.5. Despite no tsunami threat, residents panicked and began evacuating their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

Malgrat no haver-hi amenaça de tsunami, els residents es van espantar i començaren a desallotjar els seus negocis i habitatges.

src: Han descobert que el Sol funcionava sota els mateixos principis bàsics que altres estrelles: s'ha vist que l'activitat de totes les estrelles del sistema depèn de llur brillantor, llur rotació i res més. La lluminositat i la rotació s'utilitzen alhora per a determinar el nombre de Rossby d'una estrella, que està relacionat amb el flux de plasma. Com més petit sigui el nombre de Rossby, menys activa serà l'estrella respecte a les inversions magnètiques.
mt: They have discovered that the Sun worked under the same basic principles as other stars: it has been seen that the activity of all stars in the system depends on their brightness, their rotation and nothing else. The brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma flux. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star will be with respect to magnetic inversions.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: De les 1.400 persones preguntades abans de les eleccions federals de 2010, les que s'oposen que Austràlia es converteixi en una república van créixer un 8% des del 2008. La primera ministra interina Julia Gillard declarà durant la campanya de les eleccions federals del 2010 que creia que Austràlia hauria d'esdevenir una república a la fi del regnat de la Reina Elisabet II. El 34 % dels enquestats vol que la reina Isabel II sigui la darrera monarca d'Austràlia. Als extrems de l'enquesta, el 29 per cent dels enquestats creuen que Austràlia hauria de convertir-se en una república com més aviat millor, mentre que el 31 per cent creu que Austràlia mai no hauria d'esdevenir una república.
mt: 1,400 people were asked before the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8% since 2008. Interim Prime Minister Julia Gillard declared during the 2010 federal election campaign that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. The 34% of respondents want Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. At the extremes of the survey, the 29% of respondents believe that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31% believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, una portaveu de la Fundació Komen, va declarar que l'organització havia adoptat una nova regla que no permet de concedir subvencions ni finançament a organitzacions que estiguin immerses en una investigació legal. La política de Komen ha provocat la desqualificació de Planned Parenthood arran d'una investigació oberta realitzada pel diputat Cliff Stearns sobre la manera com Planned Parenthood gasta els diners i els declara. Stearns investiga si els impostos s'utilitzen per finançar avortaments mitjançant Planned Parenthood en tant que president del Subcomitè de Supervisió i Investigacions, que es troba emparat pel Comitè d'Energia Domèstica i Comerç.
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for the Komen Foundation, said the organization had adopted a new rule that would not allow it to grant subventions or funding to organizations that are embroiled in a legal investigation. Komen's policy has led to the disqualification of Planned Parenthood following an investigation opened by Congressman Cliff Stearns on how Planned Parenthood spends its money and declares it. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood as president of the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, which is under the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "L'ordinador portàtil i el telèfon móbil que havien sigut robats van ser recuperats gràcies al treball de la policia de Madhya Pradesh. L'Inspector General substitut D K Arya ha dit, ""Hem detingut cinc persones que violaren la dona suïssa i hem recuperat el seu mòbil i el seu ordinador"". Els acusats es diuen Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar i Vishnu Kanjar. El superintendent de policia Chandra Shekhar Solanki ha dit que l'acusat va comparèixer al tribunal amb el rostre cobert."
mt: "The laptop and mobile phone that had been stolen were recovered thanks to the work of the Madhya Pradesh police. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya has said, ""We have arrested five people who violated the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile phone and her laptop"". The accused are called Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Superintendent of Police Chandra Shekhar Solanki has said that the accused appeared in court with his face covered."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: L'ordinador ASUS Eee, llançat abans a escala mundial pels seus factors d'estalvi i funcionalitat, va esdevenir un tema d'interès al Mes de la Tecnologia de Taiwan de 2007. No obstant això, el mercat de consum d'ordinadors portàtils variarà i canviarà radicalment després que ASUS hagi estat guardonada per l'Executiu Yuan de la República de la Xina amb el Premi Taiwan Sostenible de l'any 2007.
mt: The ASUS Eee, launched worldwide earlier this year for its cost-saving and functionality, became a topic of interest at Taiwan's Technology Month 2007. However, the portable computer market will vary and change radically after ASUS was awarded the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Executive Yuan Award.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Els fets començaren l'1 de gener quan desenes de residents locals es van començar a queixar a l'oficina postal d'Obanazawa que no havien rebut les seves targes d'Any Nou tradicionals i regulars. Ahir, l'oficina postal es va disculpar als ciutadans i als mitjans després d'haver descobert que el jove havia amagat més de 600 documents postals, incloses 429 postals de felicitació d'any nou, que no s'havien entregat als respectius destinataris.
mt: The events began on January 1st when dozens of local residents began complaining to the Obanazawa post office that they had not received their traditional and regular New Year's greeting cards. Yesterday, the post office apologized to the citizens and the media after discovering that the young man had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's greeting cards, that had not been delivered to the respective recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray va perdre el primer set en un tie break després que ambdós mantinguessin tots i cadascun dels serveis del set. Del Potro tenia l'avantatge en el segon set, però també aquí ha calgut un desempat després d'assolir el 6-6. Potro va rebre tractament per la seva espatlla en aquell moment, però pogué tornar al partit.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tiebreak after both players held all of the set's serves. Del Potro had the advantage in the second set, but also here a tiebreak was needed after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment for his shoulder at that point, but was able to return to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "Acompanyat d'aquelles autoritats, va assegurar als ciutadans de Texas que es prenien mesures per a protegir la seguretat pública. Perry ha dit en concret: ""Hi ha pocs llocs al món més ben equipats per a afrontar el repte que se'ns posa en aquest cas"". El governador també ha declarat: ""avui hem sabut que s'han identificat alguns nens en edat escolar que van estar en contacte amb el pacient"". Va seguir dient: ""Aquest cas és seriós. Tingueu la certesa que el nostre sistema treballa tan bé com s'espera""."
mt: "Accompanied by those authorities, he assured the citizens of Texas that they were taking measures to protect public safety. Perry has said specifically: ""There are few places in the world better equipped to face the challenge that we face in this case."" The governor also declared: ""Today we have learned that some school-age children have been in contact with the patient."" He continued: ""This case is serious. Be assured that our system is working as well as it should be.""
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Molt abans de The Daily Show i The Colbert Report, Heck i Johnson van visionar una publicació que parodiés les notíciesi reportatges de notíciesquan eren estudiants a la UW l'any1988. Des de la seva creació, The Onion ha esdevingut un veritable imperi de les paròdies de notícies, amb una edició impresa, un lloc web que amb 5.000.000 visites úniques el mes d'octubre, anuncis personalitzats, una xarxa de notícies 24 hores, podcasts i un atles del món publicat recentment anomenat El Nostre Estúpid Món. Al Gore i el General Tommy Franks parlaven de manera informal dels seus titulars preferits (el de Gore fou quan The Onion publicà que ell i Tripper tingueren el millor sexe de la seva vida després de la seva derrota electoral del 2000). Molts dels seus escriptors han continuat exercint una gran influència sobre els nous programes de paròdies de Jon Stewart i Stephen Colbert.
mt: Before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson were watching a publication that parodied newsnews reportswhen they were students at UW in 1988. Since its creation, The Onion has become a real empire of news parodies, with a printed edition, a website that had 5 million unique visitors in October, personalized ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a recently published atlas of the world called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks spoke informally about their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion published that he and Tripper had the best sex of their lives after his electoral defeat in 2000). Many of its writers have continued to have a great influence on the new parodies of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: La manifestació va començar al voltant de les 11:00, hora local (UTC +1), a Whitehall, a l'altra banda de l'entrada a Downing Street, escortada per la policia, la residència oficial del primer ministre. Just després de les 11:00, els manifestants han tallat la circulació de la línia nord a Whitehall. A les 11:20, la policia va sol·licitar als manifestants que tornessin a la vorera argumentant que havien de trobar l'equilibri entre el dret de protesta i l'augment del trànsit. Cap a les 11:29, la protesta va pujar cap a Whithall, travessar Trafalgar Square, més enllà del carrer Strand, passant per Aldwych i Kingsway en direcció a Holborn, on el Partit Conservador realitzava el seu Fòrum de Primavera a l'hotel Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: The protest began around 11:00, local time (UTC +1), at Whitehall, on the other side of the entrance to Downing Street, escorted by police, the official residence of the prime minister. Just after 11:00, the protesters have blocked the north line at Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to return to the sidewalk arguing that they had to find a balance between the right to protest and the increase in traffic. Around 11:29, the protest went up to Whithall, cross Trafalgar Square, beyond the Strand street, passing by Aldwych and Kingsway towards Holborn, where the Conservative Party was holding its Spring Forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: Ara tenim ratolins de quatre mesos que no són diabètics, tot i que solien ser-ho, va afegir. El Dr. Ehud Ur, professor de medicina a la Dalhousie University a Halifaix, Nova Escòcia, i catedràtic de la divisió clínica i científica de la Canadian Diabetes Association, ha advertit que la investigació encara es troba en fase inicial. Comparteix l'escepticisme d'altres experts sobre la possibilitat de curar la diabetis, i assenyala que aquests resultats no tenen rellevància en persones que ja tenen diabetis de tipus 1.
mt: Now we have four-month-old mice that are not diabetic, even though they used to be, he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and clinical and scientific division chair of the Canadian Diabetes Association, has cautioned that the research is still in its early stages. He shares the skepticism of other experts about the possibility of curing diabetes, and points out that these results have no relevance in people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: El Twin Otter havia intentat d'aterrar a Kokoda ahir com a vol Airlines PNG CG 4684, però ja havia hagut d'avortar un cop. Va desaparèixer uns deu minuts abans que hagués d'aterrar, durant el segon intent. El lloc de l'impacte s'ha localitzat avui i és tan inaccessible que dos policies han hagut de descendir a la jungla per anar a peu fins a l'escena i cercar supervivents. El mal temps, que ja havia obstaculitzat la recerca abans, també va ser la causa de l'aterratge avortat.
mt: The Twin Otter had attempted to land at Kokoda yesterday as flight Airlines PNG CG 4684, but had already aborted once. It disappeared ten minutes before it was due to land, during the second attempt. The crash site has been located today and is so inaccessible that two police officers have had to descend into the jungle to walk to the scene and search for survivors. The bad weather, which had already hindered the search earlier, was also the cause of the aborted landing.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: Per sort no em va passar res, però vaig veure una escena macabra amb gent intentant trencar les finestres per poder sortir. La gent intentava trencar els vidres amb les cadires, però les finestres eren indestructibles. Al final un dels vidres es va trencar, i van començar a sortir per la finestra, ha dit el supervivent Franciszek Kowal.
mt: Fortunately I was not hurt, but I saw a macabre scene with people trying to break the windows to get out. People were trying to break the windows with the chairs, but the windows were indestructible. Finally one of the windows broke, and they started to get out through the window, said the survivor Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: La tempesta tropical Danielle, la quarta tempesta amb nom de la temporada d'huracans a l'Atlàntic 2010, s'ha format a l'Oceà Atlàntic oriental. La tempesta, localitzada aproximadament a 3.000 milles de Miami, Florida, té vents sostinguts màxims de 40 mph (64 km/h). Els científics del Centre Nacional d'Huracans prediuen que Danielle pujarà d'intensitat fins a la categoria d'huracà el dimecres vinent. Com que la tempesta és lluny de tocar terra, encara és difícil d'avaluar el potencial impacte als Estats Units o al Carib.
mt: Tropical Storm Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has sustained winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). National Hurricane Center scientists predict Danielle will strengthen to hurricane status on Wednesday. Because the storm is far from land, it is difficult to assess the potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: El Dr. Lee també ha mostrat la seva preocupació sobre els informes on alguns infants a Turquia han resultat infectats amb la grip aviària A(H5N1) sense emmalaltir-se. Alguns estudis senyalen que la malaltia ha d'esdevenir menys letal abans de poder provocar una epidèmia global, va fer notar. Preocupa que els pacients puguin seguir infectant altres persones amb la seva vida diària si els símptomes de la grip es mantenen lleus.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern over reports that some children in Turkey have been infected with the avian flu A(H5N1) without getting sick. Some studies indicate that the disease must become less deadly before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. He worries that patients can continue to infect others with their daily lives if the symptoms of the flu remain mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: L'ull de Morakot estava a uns setanta quilòmetres de distància de la província xinesa de Fujian a la nit del 9 d'agost. S'estima que el tifó es dirigeix cap a la Xina a una velocitat d'onze km/h.
mt: Morakot's eye was about seventy kilometers from the Chinese province of Fujian at night on August 9. It is estimated that the typhoon is heading towards China at a speed of eleven km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: El president dels Estats Units, George W. Bush, va arribar a Singapur el matí del 16 de novembre, iniciant així una gira d'una setmana per Àsia. Va ser rebut per Wong Kan Seng, viceprimer ministre de Singapur, i va tractar assumptes de comerç i terrorisme amb el primer ministre Lee Hsien Loong. Després d'una setmana de pèrdues a les eleccions de mig mandat, Bush va parlar a l'audiència sobre l'expansió del comerç a Àsia.
mt: President of the United States, George W. Bush, arrived in Singapore in the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Wong Kan Seng, Singapore's deputy prime minister, and discussed trade and terrorism with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in midterm elections, Bush spoke to the audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: El comunicat d'avui amplia, a més, el compromís que el govern va assumir el mes de març d'enguany per finançar vagons addicionals. 300 vagons addicionals se sumen al total de 1.300 que s'han d'adquirir per reduir l'acumulació de persones.
mt: 300 additional cars are added to the total of 1,300 that are to be purchased to reduce the accumulation of people.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "Va dir: ""Cap intel·ligència no suggereix que s'hagi d'esperar un atac imminent. Tanmateix, la reducció del nivell d'amenaça a sever no vol dir que l'amenaça global hagi desaparegut."
mt: "He said: "No intelligence suggests an imminent attack. However, the reduction in threat level to severe does not mean the global threat has disappeared."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Ahir Martelly va prendre jurament a un nou Consell Electoral Provisional (CEP) de nou membres. És el cinquè Consell Electoral Provisional de Martelly en quatre anys. El mes passat, una comissió presidencial va recomanar la dimissió de l'anterior Consell Electoral Provisional, en el marc d'un paquet de mesures orientades a fer avançar el país cap a unes noves eleccions. La comissió fou la resposta de Martelly a les protestes generalitzades contra el règim que s'iniciaren el mes d'octubre. Les protestes, de vegades violentes, es van desencadenar per la manca de celebració d'eleccions, algunes d'elles previstes pel 2011.
mt: Yesterday Martelly took the oath to a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members. It is the fifth Provisional Electoral Council of Martelly in four years. Last month, a presidential commission recommended the dismissal of the previous Provisional Electoral Council, as part of a package of measures aimed at moving the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to the general protests against the regime that began in October. The protests, sometimes violent, were triggered by the lack of elections, some of them scheduled for 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics dóna suport a la carta del Comitè Olímpic dels Estats Units i reconeix la necessitat absoluta de la família olímpica de promoure un entorn segur per a tots els nostres atletes. Estem d'acord amb la declaració del Comitè Olímpic dels Estats Units que es pot servir millor l'interès dels atletes i clubs, i el seu esport, amb avanços significatius dins l'organització, en comptes de treure la certificació. USA Gymnastics dóna suport a una investigació independent que podria aclarir com un abús, de la proporció descrita amb tant coratge pels supervivents de Larry Nassar, hauria pogut passar desapercebut durant tant de temps, i adopta els canvis necessaris i adequats. USA Gymnastics i la USOC tenen el mateix objectiu: fer que la gimnàstica, i altres esports, siguin tan segurs com sigui possible perquè els atletes puguin perseguir els seus somnis en un entorn segur, positiu i empoderat.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes. We agree with the statement of the United States Olympic Committee that serving the best interests of athletes and clubs, and their sport, with significant advances within the organization, is better than withdrawing certification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that could clarify how an abuse, of the proportion described with such courage by Larry Nassar's survivors, could have gone unnoticed for so long, and adopts the necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal: making gymnastics, and other sports, as safe as possible so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive, and empowered environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "La Marina dels EUA també ha dit que estan investigant l'incident. També han dit en un comunicat, ""La tripulació treballa ara mateix per a determinar la millor tècnica per a extreure la nau de manera segura"". El vaixell, un buc antimines de classe Avenger, es dirigia a Puerto Princesa, a Palawan. Està assignat a la Setena flota de la Marina dels Estats Units i té la base a Sasebo, Nagasaki (Japó)."
mt: "The U.S. Navy is also investigating the incident. They have said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best technique to safely extract the ship." The ship, an Avenger-class mine countermeasures vessel, was headed to Puerto Princesa, Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy and has its base in Sasebo, Nagasaki (Japan)."
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: A última hora de diumenge, el president dels Estats Units Donald Trump, en una declaració feta pública a través del secretari de premsa, va anunciar que les tropes estatunidenques abandonarien Síria. L'anunci es va realitzar després que Trump mantingués una conversa telefònica amb el president turc, Recep Tayyip Erdo?an. Turquia també s'encarregaria de vigilar els lluitadors de l'ISIS capturats que, diuen les declaracions, les nacions europees han rebutjat de repatriar.
mt: On Sunday, President of the United States Donald Trump, in a statement made public through the press secretary, announced that U.S. troops would leave Syria. The announcement was made after Trump held a telephone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdo?an. Turkey would also be responsible for monitoring ISIS fighters captured, who, according to the statements, European nations have refused to repatriate.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Les tropes de la coalició i les tropes afganes s'han desplaçat a la zona per a assegurar el lloc i altres avions de la coalició s'hi han desplaçat per a oferir assistència. L'accident es va produir en terreny d'alta muntanya i es creu que va ser a conseqüència de foc enemic. Els esforços de recerca del lloc d'estavellament estan compromesos pel mal temps i el terreny difícil.
mt: Coalition and Afghan troops have moved to the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have moved in to provide assistance. The accident occurred in mountainous terrain and is believed to have been caused by enemy fire. The search for the crash site is hampered by bad weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Després de la construcció de la presa l'any 1963, van cessar les inundacions estacionals que abans escampaven sediment per tot el riu. Aquest sediment era necessari per a crear bancs de sorra i platges, que servien com a hàbitats de la vida salvatge. Consegüentment, dues espècies de peixos s'han extingit i dues més es troben en perill d'extinció, inclosa la bagra geperuda. Tot i que el nivell d'aigua només pujarà uns quants peus després de la inundació, les autoritats esperen que n'hi hagi prou com per restablir els bancs de sorra erosionats riu avall.
mt: After the dam's construction in 1963, seasonal flooding that once spread sediment throughout the river ceased. This sediment was necessary to create sandbars and beaches, which served as habitats for wildlife. Consequently, two fish species have gone extinct and two more are endangered, including the pallid sturgeon. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flooding, authorities expect this will be enough to restore the eroded sandbars downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "L'ambaixada dels Estats Units que es troba a Nairobi (capital de Kenya) ha emès el següent avís: ""els extremistes de Somàlia"" estan planificant dur a terme atacs suïcides a Kenya i Etiòpia. Els EUA afirmen haver rebut informació d'una font que no s'ha fet pública que menciona específicament l'ús d'homes-bomba per a fer volar ""punts de referència prominents"" a Etiòpia i Kènia."
mt: "The U.S. Embassy in Nairobi (capital of Kenya) has issued the following alert: ""Somali extremists"" are planning to carry out suicide attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of human bombs to blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Els famosos advocats grecs Sakis Kechagioglou i George Nikolakopoulos han estat empresonats a la presó atenenca de Korydallus, ja que van ser declarats culpables de tripijoc i corrupció. A conseqüència de tot plegat, s'ha generat un gran escàndol a la comunitat jurídica grega a través de l'exposició d'accions il·legals que jutges, advocats i representants legals han comès durant els anys anteriors. Fa unes setmanes, després de la informació publicada pel periodista Makis Triantafylopoulos al seu famós programa de Televisió ""Zoungla"" a Alpha TV, el membre del Parlament i advocat, Petros Mantouvalos va abdicar, ja que membres de la seva oficina havien estat implicats en empelts il·legals i corrupció. A més, l'important jutge Evangelos Kalousis és a la presó, declarat culpable de corrupció i comportaments immorals."
mt: "The famous Greek lawyers Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens prison of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of bribery and corruption. As a result of all this, a great scandal has been generated in the Greek legal community through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers and legal representatives have committed during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his famous TV show ""Zoungla"" at Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos resigned, as members of his office had been involved in illegal bribes and corruption. In addition, the important judge Evangelos Kalousis is in prison, found guilty of corruption and immoral behavior."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa va fer la puntuació més gran a l'entrada, 70 curses en només 41 boles colpejant 11 quatres i 2 sisos. Els batedors de mitjana categoria, Sachin Tendulkar i Rahul Dravid, van jugar bé i establiren una col·laboració de cent carreres. No obstant això, després de perdre el wicket del capità, l'Índia tan sols va aconseguir fer 36 carreres i va perdre 7 wickets per acabar les entrades.
mt: Robin Uthappa made the highest score in the innings, 70 runs in just 41 balls hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, played well and established a partnership of 100 runs. However, after losing the captain's wicket, India could only make 36 runs and lost 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: L'administrador de Commons, Adam Cuerden, va expressar la seva frustració sobre les eliminacions quan va parlar amb Viquinotícies el mes passat. Bàsicament, [Wales] ens va mentir de bon començament. Primer, comportant-se com si tot allò fos per qüestions legals. Després, fent veure que ens escoltava, fins al mateix moment d'esborrar les obres d'art. L'enuig de la comunitat ha desembocat en els esforços actuals per a dissenyar una política sobre el contingut sexual del lloc, que allotja milions de fitxers multimèdia amb llicència d'ús lliure.
mt: The Commons administrator, Adam Cuerden, expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke with Wikinews last month. Basically, [Wales] lied to us from the beginning. First, acting as if all this was about legal issues. Then, pretending to listen, right up until the point of deleting the artwork. The community's ire has led to the current efforts to design a policy on the site's sexual content, which hosts millions of multimedia files with free use licenses.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "No tothom va recolzar la inclusió de categories femenines. Amir Khan, medallista de plata olímpic l'any 2004, va dir: ""En el fons crec que les dones no haurien de lluitar. Aquesta és la meva opinió"". Malgrat els seus comentaris, donarà suport als rivals britànics a les Olimpíades del 2012 que tindran lloc a Londres."
mt: "Not everyone supported the inclusion of female categories. Amir Khan, an Olympic silver medalist in 2004, said: "In my heart I believe women shouldn't fight. That's my opinion." Despite his comments, he will support British rivals at the 2012 Olympics, which will be held in London."
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, un corredor de curses de motos de 13 anys, ha mort després de veure's implicat en un accident al Circuit d'Indianàpolis. Mentre feia la volta d'escalfament, Lenz va caure de la seva motocicleta, i tot seguit va ser atropellat pel company de curses, Xavier Zayat. Va ser atès immediatament per l'equip mèdic del circuit i se'l va traslladar a un hospital local, on va morir més tard. Zayat va sortir il·lès d'l'accident.
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz has died after being involved in an accident at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While making a warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his motorcycle, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the track's medical staff and was transported to a local hospital, where he later died. Zayat walked away from the accident unharmed.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Viatjar en avió pot ser una experiència terrorífica per a gent de totes les edats i de tots els ambients, en particular si no han volat abans o si han patit una experiència traumàtica. No és pas un motiu de vergonya: no hi ha cap diferència amb les pors i les aprensions personals que molta gent manifesta envers altres coses. Per a alguns, tenir nocions sobre el funcionament d'un avió i sobre allò que ocorre durant un vol pot ajudar a superar una por que es basa en allò desconegut o en no tenir el control.
mt: Traveling by plane can be a terrifying experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if they haven't flown before or if they've had a traumatic experience. It's not a reason to be ashamed: there's no difference with the fears and anxieties that many people express towards other things. For some, having an understanding of how an airplane works and what happens during a flight can help overcome a fear that is based on the unknown or lack of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Avui en dia, és molt poc habitual fer reserves de vols directament amb l'aerolínia, sense cercar i comparar preus abans. De vegades un mateix vol pot tenir preus molt variables en diferents lectors de continguts i paga la pena de comparar els resultats de cerca i de fer un cop d'ull al lloc web de la pròpia companyia abans de reservar.
mt: Today, it is very uncommon to make flight reservations directly with the airline, without searching and comparing prices first. Sometimes the same flight can have very variable prices in different content readers and it pays to compare the search results and take a look at the airline's own website before reserving.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Les companyies de missatgeria cobren bé per entregar les coses amb rapidesa. Sovint, el temps és molt important per a documents de negocis, marxandatge o parts de substitució per a una reparació urgent. En algunes rutes, les companyies més grans tenen els seus propis avions, però hi havia un problema amb altres rutes i companyies més petites. Si van enviar les coses per avió, hi ha rutes on la descàrrega i el pas per la duana pot tardar dies. L'única manera d'enviar-ho més ràpidament, era fer-ho com a equipatge facturat. La normativa de les companyies aèries no els permetran enviar equipatge sense un passatger que el porti, i és aquí on entreu vosaltres.
mt: The mail carriers charge well for delivering things quickly. Often, time is very important for business documents, trading or parts for an urgent repair. In some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but there was a problem with other routes and smaller companies. If they sent the things by plane, there were routes where the unloading and passing through customs could take days. The only way to send it faster, was to do it as checked baggage. The airline regulations would not allow them to send baggage without a passenger to carry it, and that's where you come in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Hauríeu d'escollir amb atenció la vostra companyia de Viatger Freqüent en una aliança. Tot i que hom pot pensar que és lògic unir-se a la línia aèria amb què vola més sovint, cal tenir present que els privilegis que ofereixen solen ser diferents i que altres línies aèries dins de la mateixa aliança poden donar més punts de viatger freqüent.
mt: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline alliance carefully. While it may seem logical to join the airline that flies most often, keep in mind that the perks they offer are often different and other airlines within the same alliance may give more frequent flyer points.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Beveu begudes alcohòliques amb moderació. L'alcohol afecta cadascú de manera diferent, i és molt important que conegueu el vostre propi límit. Els possibles efectes sobre la salut de beure en excés, a llarg termini, poden incloure danys hepàtics i fins i tot la ceguera i la mort. El perill potencial augmenta quan es consumeix alcohol produït il·legalment. Els licors il·legals poden contenir diverses impureses perilloses com ara metanol, que poden provocar ceguesa o la mort fins i tot en petites dosis.
mt: Drink alcoholic beverages in moderation. Alcohol affects each person differently, and it is very important that you know your own limit. The possible long-term health effects of overdrinking may include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential risk increases when consuming alcohol produced illegally. Illicit liquor may contain various dangerous impurities such as methanol, which may cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: El Districte del Canal (Grachtengordel en neerlandès) és el famós barri del segle XVII que envolcalla el Binnenstad d'Amsterdam. Tot el barri s'ha designat Patrimoni de la Humanitat per la UNESCO pel seu valor únic històric i cultural, i el valor de les seves propietats es troba entre els més alts del país.
mt: The Canal District (Grachtengordel in Dutch) is the famous 17th-century neighborhood that surrounds the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The entire district has been designated a World Heritage Site by UNESCO for its unique historical and cultural value, and the value of its properties is among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km al sud-oest de Siem Reap. Aquest temple al cim d'una muntanya fou construït a les acaballes del segle IX, durant el regnat del Rei Yasovarman. La pujada als cims val la pena gràcies a la tètrica atmosfera del temple i les seves vistes cap al llac Tonle Sap. Es pot combinar convenientment una visita a aquest indret amb un viatge al llac en barca. Es necessita el pas Angkor per a poder entrar al temple, per això, no us oblideu de portar el passaport quan aneu a Tonlé Sap.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This temple on the top of a mountain was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The climb to the top is worth it thanks to the temple's tetrachoric atmosphere and its views of Tonle Sap Lake. It can be conveniently combined with a trip to the lake by boat. The Angkor pass is required to enter the temple, so don't forget to bring your passport when you go to Tonlé Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km al sud-oest de Siem Reap. Aquest temple al cim d'una muntanya fou construït a les acaballes del segle IX, durant el regnat del Rei Yasovarman. La pujada als cims val la pena gràcies a la tètrica atmosfera del temple i les seves vistes cap al llac Tonle Sap. Es pot combinar convenientment una visita a aquest indret amb un viatge al llac en barca. Es necessita el pas Angkor per a poder entrar al temple, per això, no us oblideu de portar el passaport quan aneu a Tonlé Sap.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This temple on the top of a mountain was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The climb to the top is worth it thanks to the temple's tetrachoric atmosphere and its views of Tonle Sap Lake. It can be conveniently combined with a trip to the lake by boat. The Angkor pass is required to enter the temple, so don't forget to bring your passport when you go to Tonlé Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: L'Antàrtida és la zona més freda de la Terra, i circumda el Pol Sud. Les visites de turistes són cares, requereixen estar en bona forma, i només es poden fer a l'estiu, entre novembre i febrer, i estan molt limitades a la península, les illes i el Mar de Ross. Un parell de milers d'empleats viuen aquí durant l'estiu en unes quatre dotzenes de bases majoritàriament en aquelles àrees; un petit nombre s'hi queda durant l'hivern. L'interior de l'Antàrtida és un altiplà desolat cobert per 2 a 3 km de gel. De tant en tant hi ha rutes aèries especialitzades que van cap a l'interior, per practicar alpinisme o arribar al Pol, on hi ha una base molt gran.
mt: The Antarctic is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are expensive, require good health, and can only be made in the summer, between November and February, and are very limited to the peninsula, islands, and Ross Sea. A few thousand employees live here during the summer in a few dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay during the winter. The interior of Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2 to 3 km of ice. Occasionally there are specialized air routes that go to the interior, to practice mountaineering or to reach the Pole, where there is a very large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Els observatoris premoderns són majoritàriament obsolets avui en dia, i romanen com a museus, o llocs d'educació. Com que la contaminació lumínica en el seu moment no un problema com ho és avui en dia, normalment es troben a ciutats o a campus, de més fàcil accés que aquells construïts actualment. La majoria dels telescopis d'investigació moderns són instal·lacions enormes en àrees remotes amb condicions atmosfèriques favorables.
mt: Pre-modern observatories are mostly obsolete today, and remain as museums, or education sites. As light pollution was not a problem at the time, they are usually located in cities or campuses, easier to access than those built today. Most modern research telescopes are enormous installations in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Les platges són abundants, ja que Auckland és a cavall de dos ports. Les més populars se situen en tres zones. Les platges de North Shore (al districte de North Harbour) donen a l'oceà Pacífic i s'estenen des de Long Bay, al nord, fins a Devonport, al sud. La majoria d'elles són platges de sorra on nedar-hi és segur, i la majoria tenen ombra gràcies als arbres pohutukawa. Les platges de Tamaki Drive són a Waitemata Harbour, als costosos barris de Mission Bay i St Heliers a Central Auckland. Aquestes són a vegades platges familiars plenes amb una bona gamma de botigues al llarg de la costa. Nedar és segur.
mt: The beaches are plentiful, as Auckland is at the crossroads of two ports. The most popular are in three areas. The North Shore (in the North Harbour district) beaches face the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay, north, to Devonport, south. Most are sandy beaches where swimming is safe, and most have shade from pohutukawa trees. The Tamaki Drive beaches are at Waitemata Harbour, in the Mission Bay and St Heliers expensive suburbs of Central Auckland. These are sometimes family-friendly beaches full of a good range of shops along the coast. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Si us plau, recordeu que bàsicament esteu visitant un cementiri de massa i un lloc amb un significat gairebé incalculable per a una part significativa de la població mundial. Encara queden molts homes i moltes dones que van sobreviure a la seva estada aquí, i molts més que hi tenien éssers estimats que van ser assassinats o hi van treballar fins a la mort, tant jueus com no jueus. Si us plau, tracteu el lloc amb tota la dignitat, solemnitat i respecte que es mereix. No feu bromes sobre l'Holocaust o els nazis. No feu malbé el lloc pintant o gravant grafits a les estructures.
mt: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a graveyard of the dead and a place of almost incalculable significance to a significant portion of the world's population.  Many men and many women still survive their stay here, and many more had loved ones who were killed or worked themselves to death here, both Jewish and non-Jewish.  Please treat the place with all the dignity, solemnity, and respect it deserves.  Do not joke about the Holocaust or the Nazis.  Do not deface the place by painting or engraving graffiti on the structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Els llenguatges auxiliars són llenguatges artificials o construïts creats amb l'objectiu de facilitar la comunicació entre persones que altrament tindrien dificultats de comunicació. Aquestes estan separades de les llengües franques, que són llengües naturals o orgàniques que, per diferents motius, adquireixen dominància com a mitjà de comunicació entre parlants d'altres llengües.
mt: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the purpose of facilitating communication between people who otherwise would have difficulty communicating. These are distinguished from the international languages, which are natural or organic languages that, for various reasons, acquire dominance as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Si creues el nord del Bàltic a l'hivern, comprova la ubicació de la cabina, perquè travessar el gel genera un soroll terrible en les més afectades. Els creuers a Sant Petersburg inclouen un temps a la ciutat. Els creuers de passatgers estan exemptes dels requisits de visat (comproveu les condicions).
mt: If you think of the Baltic in winter, check the location of the cabin, because crossing the ice generates a terrible noise in the most affected. Cruises to St. Petersburg include a time in the city. Passenger cruises are exempt from visa requirements (check the conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Els idiomes oficials de Barcelona són el català i el castellà. Prop de la meitat prefereixen parlar en català, una gran majoria l'entén, i gairebé tothom sap castellà. Ara bé, la majoria dels senyals només estan en català perquè és, per llei, l'idioma oficial prioritari. Tanmateix, el castellà també s'usa àmpliament en el transport públic i altres instal·lacions. Els missatges regulars al metro es fan només en català, però les interrupcions no previstes s'anuncien amb un sistema automatitzat en molts idiomes inclosos el castellà, l'anglès, el francès, l'àrab i el japonès.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. Nearly half prefer to speak Catalan, a large majority understand it, and almost everyone knows Spanish. However, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Metro announcements are made only in Catalan, but unscheduled interruptions are announced with an automated system in many languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Avui en dia, l'oferta d'allotjament i esmorzar de luxe als països desenvolupats s'ha convertit gairebé en una forma d'art. En l'extrem superior, els B&Bs competeixen òbviament sobretot en dues coses principals: el llit i l'esmorzar. Consegüentment, hom pot trobar en aquests establiments els llençols més luxosos, potser una vànova teixida a mà o un llit antic. L'esmorzar pot incloure delícies regionals de temporada o l'especialitat de l'amfitrió. L'escenari pot ser un edifici històric amb mobles antics, terrenys ben curats i una piscina.
mt: Today, the luxury accommodation and breakfast offerings in developed countries have almost become a form of art. At the high end, B&Bs are clearly competing primarily in two main things: the bed and the breakfast. Consequently, one can find in these establishments the most luxurious linens, perhaps a handwoven duvet or an antique bed. The breakfast can include seasonal regional delicacies or the host's specialty. The setting can be a historic building with antique furniture, well-tended grounds and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: La ciutat de Pequín a la Xina serà la ciutat amfitriona dels Jocs Olímpics d'hivern el 2022, que la convertiran en la primera ciutat en haver acollit tant els jocs d'estiu com els d'hivern. Beijing serà la seu de les cerimònies d'obertura i clausura així com els esdeveniments sobre gel en espais tancats. Altres esdeveniments d'esquí es realitzaran a la zona d'esquí de Taizicheng a Zhangjiakou, a uns 220 km (140 milles) de Pequín.
mt: Beijing, China will be the host city of the Winter Olympics in 2022, making it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter games. Beijing will be the site of the opening and closing ceremonies as well as the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be held at the ski area of Taizicheng in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: La grip dels ocells, o més formalment grip aviària, pot infectar ocells i mamífers. En humans s'han detallat menys d'un miler de casos, però alguns han resultat fatals. En la majoria de casos es tracta de persones que treballen amb aus de corral, però també existeix cert risc per als observadors d'aus.
mt: Avian influenza, or bird flu, can infect birds and mammals. In humans, fewer than a thousand cases have been detailed, but some have been fatal. Most cases involve people who work with poultry, but there is some risk for bird watchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Els vikings usaven les vies navegables russes per a arribar a la Mar Negra i a la Mar Càspia. Algunes parts d'aquestes rutes encara es poden usar. Reviseu possibles requisits de permisos especials, que poden ser difícils d'obtenir. El canal Mar BlancMar Bàltic uneix l'Oceà Àrtic amb el Mar Bàltic, a través del Llac Onega, el Llac Ladoga i Sant Petersburg, majoritàriament mitjançant rius i llacs. El llac Onega també està connectat amb el Volga, de manera que encara es pot arribar al mar Caspi a través de Rússia.
mt: The Vikings used the Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some parts of these routes are still in use. Check for possible special permits, which may be difficult to obtain. The White SeaBaltic Sea route connects the Arctic Ocean with the Baltic Sea, mainly through rivers and lakes, via the Onega Lake, Ladoga Lake and Saint Petersburg. The Onega Lake is also connected with the Volga, so it is still possible to reach the Caspian Sea through Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Normalment, la primera aturada després de desembarcar d'un avió, un vaixell o un altre vehicle és un punt de control d'immigració. A alguns trens que travessen fronteres es realitzen inspeccions mentre el tren està en marxa i heu de tenir un document d'identitat vàlid quan embarqueu a un d'aquests. El conductor pot recollir els passaports als trens nocturns per no haver d'interrompre el son.
mt: Normally, the first stop after disembarking from an airplane, a ship or other vehicle is an immigration checkpoint. Some trains that cross borders have inspections while the train is in motion and you must have a valid identification document when boarding one of these. The conductor can collect passports on overnight trains to avoid interrupting sleep.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

The conductor can collect passports on overnight trains to avoid interrupting sleep.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "Generalment, Singapur és un lloc extremadament segur i molt fàcil de navegar, i podeu comprar pràcticament qualsevol cosa després d'arribar. Però en situar-se als ""tròpics alts"" a només uns pocs graus al nord de l'equador, hauràs de fer front tant a la calor (sempre) com al sol fort (quan el cel està clar, més rarament)."
mt: "Generally, Singapore is an extremely safe and easy place to navigate, and you can buy practically anything after arriving. But by being at the ""tropical high"" just a few degrees north of the equator, you'll have to deal with both the heat (always) and the strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: La pastisseria alemanya és força bona i la de Baviera és molta i molt diversa, semblant a la d'Àustria, els seus veïns meridionals. Les pastes amb fruita són habituals, amb pomes cuites dins de les pastes tot l'any i cireres i prunes que apareixen a l'estiu. Molts productes alemanys fets al forn també porten ametlles, avellanes i altres fruites seques. Els pastissos més coneguts sovint mariden bé amb una tassa de cafè fort. Si voleu pastes petites, però plenes de sabor, tasteu el que segons la regió s'anomena Berliner, Pfannkuchen o Krapfen.
mt: German bakeries are very good and those in Bavaria are very diverse, similar to those in Austria, their southern neighbors. Pies with fruit are common, with baked apples inside the pies all year and cherries and plums that appear in the summer. Many German oven-made products also carry almonds, hazelnuts and other dried fruits. The best-known pastries often pair well with a strong cup of coffee. If you want small pastries, but full of flavor, taste what in the region is called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
