src: L'Illa de Hong Kong dona nom al territori de Hong Kong i és el lloc que molts turistes consideren el centre principal. El conjunt d'edificis que conformen la silueta urbana de Hong Kong s'ha relacionat amb un gràfic de barres brillant que es fa evident amb la presència de les aigües de Victoria Harbour. Per aconseguir les millors vistes de Hong Kong, abandoneu l'illa i aneu cap a l'altra banda del passeig marítim de Kowloon. La gran majoria del desenvolupament urbà de l'illa de Hong Kong està densament poblat en terreny guanyat al mar al llarg de la costa nord. Aquest és el lloc que els colonitzadors britànics van ocupar, per tant, és un bon indret on començar si cerqueu proves del passat colonial del territori.
mt: Hong Kong Island is the name of the territory of Hong Kong and is the place that many tourists consider the main center. The set of buildings that make up the urban silhouette of Hong Kong has been related to a bright bar graph that becomes evident with the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and go to the other side of the Kowloon waterfront. Most of the urban development of Hong Kong Island is densely populated on reclaimed land along the north coast. This is the place that the British colonizers occupied, so it is a good place to start if you are looking for evidence of the colonial past of the territory.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Els estreps són suports per als peus del genet que pengen de cada costat de la sella. Són més estables pel genet, però poden presentar problemes de seguretat perquè els peus del genet s'hi podrien quedar atrapats. Si un genet es llança del cavall però té un peu enganxat a l'estrep, podria ser arrossegat si el cavall fuig corrent. Per tal de minimitzar aquest risc es poden prendre diverses precaucions de seguretat. Per començar, la majoria dels genets porten botes de muntar amb un tacó i una sola prima i força prima. A més, algunes selles, en particular les angleses, tenen barres de seguretat que permeten que el cuir de l'estrep caigui de la muntura si un genet l'estira cap enrere en caure.
mt: Straps are supports for the rider's feet that hang from each side of the saddle. They are more stable for the rider, but can present safety issues because the rider's feet could get stuck in them. If a rider falls off a horse but has a foot stuck in a strap, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, several safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a single toe and very thin soles. Additionally, some saddles, particularly English, have safety bars that allow the leather of the strap to fall from the saddle if a rider pulls it back while falling.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Una xarxa d'intercanvi d'hospitalitat és l'organització que connecta viatgers amb veïns en les ciutats que van a visitar. Per unir-se a una xarxa tan atípica, en general només cal emplenar un qüestionari, tot i que algunes xarxes ofereixen o demanen una verificació addicional. Aleshores s'ofereix un llistat d'amfitrions disponibles bé en forma impresa bé en línia, de vegades amb citacions i opinions d'altres viatgers. Couchsurfing es va fundar el gener del 2004 arran que el programador Casey Fenton trobés un vol econòmic per anar a Islàndia, però no tenia cap lloc on allotjar-se. Va escriure correus als estudiants de la universitat del lloc i va rebre un nombre aclaparador d'ofertes d'allotjament gratuït.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with neighbors in the cities they visit. To join such an atypical network, usually all one needs to do is fill out a questionnaire, though some networks offer or request additional verification. Then a list of available hosts is offered either in print or online, sometimes with quotes and opinions from other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after the programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland, but had nowhere to stay. He wrote emails to students at the location's university and received an overwhelming number of offers of free lodging.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Els albergs solen anar dirigits a un públic jove - un hoste típic té una vintena d'anys - però sovint també s'hi poden trobar viatgers de més edat. Les famílies amb nens són rares de veure, però els hotels deixen que s'allotgin en habitacions privades.
mt: Hostels are usually aimed at a young audience - a typical guest is in their twenties - but often also cater to older travelers. Families with children are rare to see, but hotels allow them to stay in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: El llançament de bumerang és una habilitat popular que molts turistes miren d'aprendre. Si vols aprendre a llançar un bumerang que us torni a la mà, assegura't de tenir-ne un dels que retornen. La majoria dels bumerangs disponibles a Austràlia són, de fet, bumerangs que no tornen. És millor que els principiants no intentin de llançar-los amb vent
mt: The boomerang throw is a popular skill that many tourists try to learn. If you want to learn to throw a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have one of the ones that return. Most of the boomerangs available in Australia are, in fact, boomerangs that do not return. It is better that beginners not try to throw them with wind.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Amb 17.000 illes per escollir, el menjar indonesi és un terme genèric per a cobrir una gran varietat de cuines regionals que es troben arreu del país. Però, si s'utilitza sense cap altre qualificatiu, el terme sol significar el menjar originari de les regions central i oriental de l'illa principal de Java. Avui en dia, la cuina javanesa és fàcil de trobar per tot arreu de l'arxipèlag i ofereix una gran varietat de plats condimentats de forma senzilla. Els sabors preferits dels javanesos solen ser els dels cacauets, els bitxos, el sucre (sobretot el sucre de coco javanès) i diverses espècies aromàtiques.
mt: 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is a blanket term to cover a wide variety of regional cuisines found throughout the country. However, if used without any other qualifier, the term usually refers to the cuisine originating from the central and eastern regions of the main island of Java. Today, Javanese cuisine is easy to find throughout the archipelago and offers a wide variety of simply seasoned dishes. The preferred flavors of the Javanese usually include peanuts, cloves, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Per a aquells poc familiars amb l'argot mèdic, les paraules infecciós i contagiós tenen significats diferents. Una malaltia infecciosa és aquella causada per un patogen, com ara un virus, bacteri, fong o altres paràsits. Una malaltia contagiosa és una malaltia que es transmet fàcilment quan s'està a prop d'una persona infectada. Molts governs requereixen que els visitants que entrin o els residents que surtin dels seus països siguin vacunats per a una sèrie de malalties. Sovint aquests requisits depenen dels països que el viatger ha visitat precedentment o pretengui visitar.
mt: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have different meanings. An infectious disease is one caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is one that is easily transmitted when in close proximity to an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering or residents leaving their countries to be vaccinated for a series of diseases. Often these requirements depend on the countries the traveler has previously visited or intends to visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Els proveïdors de les VPN personals (xarxa privada virtual) són una manera excel·lent d'evitar tant la censura política com el geo-filtratge d'IP comercial. Aquests són millors que els proxies web per diferents motius: per exemple, no es limiten a redirigir els http sino ho fan amb tot el trànsit d'internet. Solen oferir una amplada de banda superior i un servei de millor qualitat. Estan encriptats i, per tant, són més difícils d'espiar.
mt: Personal VPN providers are an excellent way to avoid both political censorship and commercial IP geo-filtering. These are better than web proxies for several reasons: for example, they don't just redirect http but do so with all internet traffic. They usually offer a higher bandwidth and better service quality. They are encrypted and thus are harder to spy on.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Com que les trucades s'adrecen a través d'internet, no cal que tinguis una companyia telefònica ubicada allà on vius o on viatges. Tampoc no necessiteu un número local de la comunitat on viviu; podeu aconseguir una connexió a Internet per satèl·lit a les regions més desolades de Chicken, Alaska i seleccionar un número que afirmi que sou sota el sol d'Arizona. Sovint, heu de comprar un número global per separat per permetre que els telèfons XTC us puguin trucar. L'origen del número telefònic provoca una diferència per a les persones que us truquen.
mt: Because the calls are made over the Internet, you don't need to be with a phone company located where you live or where you travel. You don't need a local community number; you can get a satellite Internet connection in the most remote regions of Chicken, Alaska and select a number that claims you are under the sun of Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global phone number separately to allow XTC phones to call you. The origin of the phone number causes a difference for people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: La pronunciació és relativament senzilla en italià, ja que la majoria de les paraules es pronuncien exactament com estan escrites. Les principals lletres que cal vigilar són la c i la g, ja que la seva pronunciació varia en funció de les vocals que les segueixen. A més, asseguris de pronunciar la r i la rr de forma diferent: caro significa estimat, mentre que carro significa carrossa.
mt: The pronunciation is relatively simple in Italian, as most words are pronounced exactly as they are written. The main letters to watch out for are the c and the g, as their pronunciation varies depending on the vowels that follow them. In addition, make sure to pronounce the r and the rr differently: caro means dear, while carro means carriage.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: ?zmir és la tercera ciutat més gran de Turquia, amb una població d'aproximadament 3,7 milions d'habitants, el segon port més gran després del d'Istanbul, i un molt bon centre de transport. La que va ser l'antiga ciutat d'Esmirna, ara és un centre comercial modern, desenvolupat i concorregut, situat al voltant d'una badia enorme i envoltada per muntanyes. Els amplis passejos, els edificis amb façanes de vidre i els centres comercials moderns estan esquitxats de teulats tradicionals de teules vermelles, el mercat del segle XVIII i les antigues mesquites i esglésies, tot i que la ciutat exhala una atmosfera més de l'Europa mediterrània que de la Turquia tradicional.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey, with a population of approximately 3.7 million, the second largest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport center. The former city of Smyrna, now is a modern, developed and busy commercial center, located around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The wide promenades, buildings with glass facades and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market and the old mosques and churches, although the city exudes a more Mediterranean European than traditional Turkish atmosphere.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: La contemplació de les flors de cirerer, acció coneguda com hanami, forma part de la cultura japonesa del segle VIII ençà. El concepte prové de la Xina, on la flor del cirerer era la més apreciada. Al Japó, les primeres celebracions de les flors dels cirerers les organitzava l'emperador només per a ell mateix i altres membres de l'aristocràcia al voltant de la cort imperial.
mt: The viewing of cherry blossoms, known as hanami, has been part of Japanese culture since the eighth century. The concept comes from China, where the cherry blossom was the most prized flower. In Japan, the first cherry blossom celebrations were organized by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the imperial court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jerusalem és la capital i la ciutat més gran d'Israel, tot i que ni la majoria dels països ni les Nacions Unides no la reconeixen com a capital del país. L'antiga ciutat als Turons de Judea té una història fascinant que abasta milers d'anys. La ciutat és sagrada per a les tres religions monoteistes - el judaisme, el cristianisme i l'islam, i serveix de centre espiritual, religiós i cultural. A causa del significat religiós de la ciutat, i en particular de molts llocs de la zona de la Ciutat Antiga, Jerusalem és un dels majors atractius turístics d'Israel. Jerusalem té molts llocs d'interès històrics, arqueològics i culturals, a més de centres comercials, cafès i restaurants d'allò més animats i concorreguts.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though neither the majority of countries nor the United Nations recognize it as the country's capital. The ancient city on the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is sacred to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular of many sites in the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of Israel's major tourist attractions. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites of interest, in addition to bustling and crowded commercial centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

L'antiga ciutat als Turons de Judea té una història fascinant que abasta milers d'anys. La ciutat és sagrada per a les tres religions monoteistes - el judaisme, el cristianisme i l'islam, i serveix de centre espiritual, religiós i cultural. A causa del significat religiós de la ciutat, i en particular de molts llocs de la zona de la Ciutat Antiga, Jerusalem és un dels majors atractius turístics d'Israel. Jerusalem té molts llocs d'interès històrics, arqueològics i culturals, a més de centres comercials, cafès i restaurants d'allò més animats i concorreguts.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though neither the majority of countries nor the United Nations recognize it as the country's capital. The ancient city on the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is sacred to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular of many sites in the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of Israel's major tourist attractions. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites of interest, in addition to bustling and crowded commercial centers, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: El Parc Nacional Kruger està situat al nord-est de Sud-àfrica i recorre la frontera de Moçambic a l'est, i la de Zimbàbue al nord, i el Riu Crocodile marca la frontera sud. El parc cobreix 19.500 km² i es divideix en 14 ecozones diferents, cadascuna assistint vida salvatge diversa. És una de les atraccions més importants de Sud-àfrica i és considerada el referent dels parcs nacionals sud-africans (SANParks). Com passa amb tots els parcs nacionals sud-africans, s'ha de pagar una tarifa diària de conservació i entrada. També pot resultar beneficiós comprar una Wild Card, que permet l'entrada bé a una selecció de parcs de Sudàfrica, bé a tots els Parcs Nacionals de Sudàfrica.
mt: Located in northeastern South Africa, the Kruger National Park runs along the border of Mozambique to the east, and Zimbabwe to the north, and the Crocodile River marks the southern border. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different ecozones, each supporting diverse wildlife. It is one of South Africa's most important attractions and is considered the benchmark of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there is a daily conservation and entrance fee. It may also be beneficial to purchase a Wild Card, which allows entry either to a selection of South African parks, or to all South African National Parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Imponent sobre el cap septentrional de Machu Picchu hi ha aquesta muntanya, sovint el teló de fons de moltes fotografies de les runes. Sembla una mica imponent des de sota i és una pujada empinada i difícil, però la majoria de gent mínimament en forma ho hauria de poder fer en uns 45 minuts. Les escales de pedra es col·loquen al llarg de la major part del camí, i a les seccions amb més pendent hi ha cables d'acer per aguantar-se. Dit això, espereu-vos quedar sense alè, i aneu amb compte en els segments més empinats, sobretot si hi ha humitat, perquè pot esdevenir perillós ràpidament. Prop del cim hi ha una cova minúscula que cal travessar; és força baixa i estreta.
mt: This mountain looms over the northern end of Machu Picchu, often the backdrop of many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit imposing from below and is a steep and difficult climb, but most people in decent shape should be able to do it in about 45 minutes. Stone staircases are placed along most of the trail, and there are steel cables to hold on to in the steeper sections. Just be prepared to get out of breath, and be careful in the steeper sections, especially if it's wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. Near the top there is a tiny cave to cross; it's quite low and narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: La cuina mallorquina, com la d'altres zones semblants de la Mediterrània, es basa en el pa, les verdures i la carn (sobretot de porc), i fa servir l'oli d'oliva arreu. Un sopar senzill i popular, sobretot a l'estiu, és el Pa amb oli: pa amb oli d'oliva, tomàtiga i qualsevol condiment disponible com ara formatge, tonyina, etc.
mt: Mallorcan cuisine, like that of other similar areas of the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and uses olive oil everywhere. A simple and popular supper, especially in the summer, is Pa amb oli: bread with olive oil, tomato and any available condiment such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Un àpat Hangi es cuina dins una clot calent a terra. El clot s'escalfa amb pedres calentes d'un foc o en alguns indrets la calor geotèrmica crea zones de terra calenta de manera natural. El hangi es fa servir sovint per cuinar un àpat rostit a la manera tradicional. Molts de llocs a Rotorua ofereixen hangi geotèrmics, mentre que es poden prendre altres hangi a Christchurch, Wellington i qualsevol altre lloc.
mt: A hangi is cooked in a pit heated by hot stones. The pit is heated with hot stones from a fire or in some places the geothermal heat creates naturally hot areas of land. The hangi is often used to cook a roast meal in a traditional way. Many places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be taken in Christchurch, Wellington and any other place.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Durant les visites als monestirs, les dones s'han de posar faldilles que cobreixin els genolls i també s'han de tapar les espatlles. La majoria dels monestirs ofereixen cobertes a les dones que no venen preparades, però si porteu la vostra, especialment una amb colors brillants, obtindreu un somriure del monjo o monja de l'entrada. D'igual manera, els homes també han de posar-se pantalons que els cobreixin els genolls. Aquesta peça també es pot demanar a l'entrada, però es tracta de roba que no es renta després de cada ús, de manera que potser us resulta incòmoda dur aquestes faldilles. La talla és única!
mt: During visits to monasteries, women must wear skirts that cover the knees and also must cover their shoulders. Most monasteries offer coverings for women who are not prepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you will get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Similarly, men must also wear pants that cover the knees. This piece can also be requested at the entrance, but it is clothing that is not washed after each use, so it may be uncomfortable to wear these skirts. The size is unique!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Si visiteu les àrees de l'Àrtic o de l'Antàrtida a l'hivern, viureu la nit polar, en què el sol no arriba a sortir per l'horitzó. Això brinda una bona oportunitat per veure l'aurora boreal, ja que el cel romandrà fosc pràcticament tot el dia. Com que les àrees són poc poblades, i per tant la contaminació lumínica no sol ser un problema, també podreu gaudir de les estrelles.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic in winter, you will experience polar night, when the sun does not rise above the horizon. This gives you a good opportunity to see the aurora borealis, as the sky will remain dark for most of the day. As the areas are sparsely populated, and thus light pollution is not usually a problem, you can also enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: En ubicacions llunyanes i sense cobertura telefònica, pot ser que la telefonia per satèl·lit sigui la teva única opció. Un telèfon via satèl·lit no sol ser un substitut d'un telèfon mòbil, ja que cal trobar-se a l'exterior amb una línia de visibilitat clara per a fer una trucada telefònica. El servei se sol usar en les embarcacions, incloses les naus recreatives, així com en expedicions que necessiten dades i veus remotes. El teu proveïdor de serveis de telefonia local t'hauria de poder donar més informació sobre com connectar-te a aquest servei.
mt: In remote locations without cell phone coverage, satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not a substitute for a cell phone, as you must be outside with a clear line of sight to make a call. The service is often used on boats, including recreational vessels, as well as expeditions that need remote data and voice. Your local phone service provider should be able to give you more information on how to connect to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: La capital de Moldàvia és Chi?in?u. La llengua pròpia és el romanès, però el rus és d'ús comú. Moldàvia és una república multiètnic que ha patit conflictes ètnics. L'any 1994, el conflicte va desembocar en la creació de l'autoproclamada República de Transnístria, a la Moldàvia oriental, que gaudeix d'un govern i una moneda propis, tot i que no té el reconeixement de cap país membre de les Nacions Unides. Els enllaços econòmics s'han restablert entre aquestes dues parts de Moldàvia malgrat el fracàs de les negociacions polítiques. La religió principal de Moldàvia és la cristiana ortodoxa.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chi?in?u. The native language is Romanian, but Russian is commonly used. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered ethnic conflicts. In 1994, the conflict culminated in the creation of the self-proclaimed Republic of Transnistria, in eastern Moldova, which enjoys its own government and currency, although it is not recognized by any member of the United Nations. Economic links have been restored between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure of political negotiations. The main religion of Moldova is Eastern Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "Com que Montevideo es troba al sud de l'Equador, allà és estiu quan a l'hemisferi nord és hivern, i viceversa. Montevideo es troba a la zona subtropical. En els mesos d'estiu, són habituals les temperatures per sobre de 30 °C. L'hivern pot ser falsament fred: les temperatures rarament assoleixen nivells sota zero, però el vent i la humiditat es combinen perquè la sensació sigui més freda que allò que senyala el termòmetre. No hi ha estacions particularment ""plujoses"" o ""seques"": la quantitat de pluja és més o menys invariable al llarg de l'any."
mt: "Because Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it is winter in the Northern Hemisphere, and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropical zone. In the summer months, temperatures above 30 °C are common. Winter can be falsely cold: temperatures rarely fall below zero, but the wind and humidity combine to make the sensation colder than what the thermometer indicates. There are no particularly ""wet"" or ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain is more or less constant throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Els murals o gargots que es realitzen sense que ningú ho demani s'anomenen grafits. Tot i no ser en absolut un fenomen modern, la majoria de persones ho associen amb els joves que fan malbé la propietat pública i privada usant pintura en esprai. Tanmateix, avui en dia hi ha artistes de renom, esdeveniments relacionats amb el grafit i murs ""legals"". Les obres de grafit en aquest context sovint tenen més d'obres d'art que de gargots il·legibles."
mt: "Murals or tags that are done without anyone asking for them are called graffiti. Although not at all a modern phenomenon, most people associate it with young people who vandalize public and private property using spray paint. However, today there are renowned artists, graffiti-related events, and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti works in this context often have more of an art piece than illegible tags."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: En alguns festivals, la immensa majoria dels assistents decideixen d'acampar allà mateix, i la majoria dels assistents ho consideren una part vital de l'experiència. Si voleu ser a prop de l'acció, caldrà que hi arribeu ben d'hora per aconseguir un lloc on acampar a prop de la música. Cal recordar que encara que s'hagi acabat la música als escenaris principals hi poden haver seccions del festival que segueixin tocant fins ben entrada la nit. Alguns festivals tenen àrees d'acampada especials per a famílies amb fills petits.
mt: At some festivals, the vast majority of attendees decide to camp on site, and the majority of attendees consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you'll need to arrive early to secure a spot to camp near the music. Remember that even though the main stages have stopped playing, there may be sections of the festival that continue playing until very late at night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: En alguns festivals, la immensa majoria dels assistents decideixen d'acampar allà mateix, i la majoria dels assistents ho consideren una part vital de l'experiència. Si voleu ser a prop de l'acció, caldrà que hi arribeu ben d'hora per aconseguir un lloc on acampar a prop de la música. Cal recordar que encara que s'hagi acabat la música als escenaris principals hi poden haver seccions del festival que segueixin tocant fins ben entrada la nit. Alguns festivals tenen àrees d'acampada especials per a famílies amb fills petits.
mt: At some festivals, the vast majority of attendees decide to camp on site, and the majority of attendees consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you'll need to arrive early to secure a spot to camp near the music. Remember that even though the main stages have stopped playing, there may be sections of the festival that continue playing until very late at night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: "Atesa la gran distància que hi ha fins a molts dels ""pueblos"", no trobareu gaire vida nocturna tret que visiteu Albuquerque o Santa Fe. Tanmateix, gairebé tots els casinos esmentats més amunt serveixen begudes, i molts d'ells ofereixen entreteniment de primera classe (sobretot els més grans, als voltants d'Albuquerque i de Santa Fe). Compte: els bars dels petits pobles d'aquí no sempre són un bon lloc per als visitants d'altres estats. Per algun motiu, el nord de New Mexico té problemes significants amb els conductors ebris, i la concentració de conductors beguts és alta a prop dels bars dels petits pobles."
mt: "Given the great distances to many of the ""pueblos"", you won't find much nightlife except if you visit Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, almost all of the casinos mentioned above serve drinks, and many of them offer top-notch entertainment (especially the larger ones, around Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Note: the bars in the small towns here are not always a good place for visitors from other states. For some reason, the north of New Mexico has significant problems with drunk drivers, and the concentration of drunk drivers is high near the bars of the small towns."
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "La cervesa local més coneguda és la ""Number One""; no es tracta d'una cervesa complexa, però és agradable i refrescant. L'altra cervesa local es diu ""Manta"". S'hi poden prendre molts vins francesos, però els vins de Nova Zelanda i Austràlia no acaben de tolerar bé els viatges. És del tot segur beure aigua de l'aixeta local, però si us fa por, l'aigua embotellada és fàcil de trobar. Per als australians, el concepte de tallat  és foraster. Un cafè curt és un cafè exprés, el caputxino ve ben carregat de nata (sense escuma), i el te se serveix sense llet. La xocolata desfeta arriba als estàndards belgues. Els sucs de fruita són cars però la qualitat és excel·lent."
mt: "The local most famous beer is the ""Number One""; it is not a complex beer, but it is pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". Many French wines are available, but New Zealand and Australian wines do not travel well. It is perfectly safe to drink tap water, but if you are worried, bottled water is easy to find. For Australians, the concept of ""short""  is foreign. A short coffee is an espresso, a capuchino comes loaded with cream (no foam), and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate comes to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive but the quality is excellent."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Els guaranís foren el grup indígena més important que habitava el que avui és el Paraguai oriental, i vivien com a caçadors seminòmades que també practicaven l'agricultura de subsistència. La regió Chaco era la llar d'altres grups de tribus indígenes com ara els Guaycurú i els Payaguá, que sobrevivien caçant, recol·lectant i pescant. El Paraguai, anteriorment anomenat ""La Província Gegant de les Índies"", va ser creat al segle XVI a conseqüència de l'encontre entre els conqueridors espanyols i els grups d'indígenes natius. Els espanyols van iniciar el període de colonització que va durar tres segles. D'ençà de la fundació d'Asunción el 1537, el Paraguai ha aconseguit mantenir una gran part del seu caràcter i identitat indígenes."
mt: "The Guaraní were the most important indigenous group that inhabited what is now eastern Paraguay, and lived as semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers who also practiced subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was the home of other indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and the Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering, and fishing. Paraguay, previously known as "The Giant Province of the Indies", was created in the 16th century as a result of the encounter between Spanish conquerors and the native indigenous groups. The Spanish initiated the period of colonization that lasted three centuries. Since the founding of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to maintain a large part of its indigenous character and identity."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Els parisencs tenen fama de ser egocèntrics, maleducats i arrogants. Tot i que això sol ser només un estereotip imprecís, la millor manera de portar-se bé a París és comportar-se com millor puguis, actuar com algú que sigui ""bien élevé"" (ben educat). Això farà que et puguis moure de manera molt més senzilla. L'aparença brusca dels parisencs desapareixerà ràpidament si mostreu un mínim de cortesia."
mt: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, ill-mannered and arrogant. While this is often just an imprecise stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris is to behave as well as you can, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well-bred). This will make you move around much more easily. The brusque appearance of Parisians will quickly disappear if you show the slightest courtesy."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail té dues classes de trens suburbans dins i als voltants de Ciutat del Cap: MetroPlus (també anomenat First Class) i Metro (Third Class). MetroPlus és més còmode i està menys concorregut, però és una mica més car, encara que segueix sent més barat que els bitllets de metro normals a Europa. Tots els trens tenen vagons Metro i MetroPlus; els vagons MetroPlus sempre són al final del tren més proper a Ciutat del Cap.
mt: MetroRail has two classes of suburban trains within and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also known as First Class) and Metro (Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded, but is a little more expensive, although still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. All trains have Metro and MetroPlus cars; MetroPlus cars are always at the end of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: El viatgers poden trobar-se amb plagues d'animals amb els quals no estan familiaritzats en les seves regions d'origen. Les plagues poden fer malbé el menjar, causar irritació o, en casos pitjors, causar reaccions al·lèrgiques, difondre verí o transmetre infeccions. Les malalties infeccioses, o els animals capaços de ferir o matar gent per la força, normalment no es consideren plagues.
mt: Travelers may encounter pests with which they are unfamiliar in their regions of origin. Pests can damage food, cause irritation, or, in worst cases, cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases, or animals capable of injuring or killing people by force, are generally not considered pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Totes les botigues de queviures tenen una confusa multitud de targetes de telèfon prepagades que es poden usar tant per telèfons de pagament com per telèfons normals. Malgrat que la majoria de targetes són vàlides per a trucar a qualsevol indret, algunes s'especialitzen en oferir tarifes de trucada convenients a grups de països específics. Se sol accedir a quests serveis a través d'un número de telèfon gratuït que es pot trucar des de la majoria de telèfons sense haver de pagar.
mt: All grocery stores have a confusing mob of prepaid phone cards that can be used both for pay phones and for normal phones. While most cards are valid for calling anywhere, some specialize in offering calling rates convenient to groups of specific countries. These services are usually accessed through a free phone number that can be called from most phones without having to pay.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: El parc nacional de Plitvice Lakes és molt boscós, amb faigs, pícees i avets, i alberga una mescla de vegetació alpina i mediterrània. Gaudeix d'una notable varietat de comunitats vegetals, gràcies a la seva gamma de microclimes, els diferents sòls i les diverses altituds. La zona també és la llar d'una vastíssima varietat d'espècies d'animals i ocells. S'hi pot trobar fauna pecular com l'ós bru europeu, el llop, l'àguila, el mussol, el linx, el gat salvatge i el gall fer, juntament amb moltes espècies més comunes.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is very wooded, with beeches, pines and firs, and hosts a mix of alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It boasts a notable variety of plant communities, thanks to its range of microclimates, different soils and varying altitudes. The area is also home to a vast variety of animal and bird species. It is home to unique fauna such as the brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wildcat and capercaillie, along with many more common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "Les empreses multimèdia menteixen una vegada i una altra sobre l'objectiu d'aquesta acció, adduint que es fa per ""prevenir la pirateria"". De fet, els codis regionals no tenen cap mena d'efecte en les còpies il·legals; una còpia bit per bit d'un disc es reprodueix igual de bé en qualsevol dispositiu en què es pugui reproduir l'original. El propòsit actual és d'oferir un major control a aquestes empreses sobre els seus mercats; es tracta de generar diners."
mt: "Multimedia companies lie once and again about the goal of this action, claiming that it is done to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have no effect on illegal copies; a bit-for-bit copy of a disc reproduces just as well on any device that can play the original. The current purpose is to offer greater control to these companies over their markets; it is about generating money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Malgrat que el control d'immigració sol ser absent o una formalitat quan tornes al teu país, el control duaner pot ser un destorb. Assegureu-vos d'esbrinar què podeu portar i què no, i declareu tot allò que sobrepassi el límit legal.
mt: While immigration control is often absent or a formality when returning to your home country, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and can't bring, and declare anything that exceeds the legal limit.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Malgrat que el control d'immigració sol ser absent o una formalitat quan tornes al teu país, el control duaner pot ser un destorb. Assegureu-vos d'esbrinar què podeu portar i què no, i declareu tot allò que sobrepassi el límit legal.
mt: While immigration control is often absent or a formality when returning to your home country, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and can't bring, and declare anything that exceeds the legal limit.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: La vall de Cochamó: la destinació d'escalada més destacada de Xile, també anomenada la Yosemite d'Amèrica del Sud, compta amb moltes parets de granit de grans dimensions i penya-segats. Hi ha unes vistes impressionants des dels pics. Escaladors de totes parts del món estableixen contínuament noves rutes entre la seva inacabable extensió de parets.
mt: The Cochamó Valley: Chile's most famous climbing destination, also known as the Yosemite of South America, boasts many large granite walls and buttresses. There are impressive views from the peaks. Climbers from all over the world continue to establish new routes in its endless expanse of walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Si vols fer la volta al món volant íntegrament per l'hemisferi sud, les opcions de vols i destinacions són limitades per la manca de rutes transoceàniques. No hi ha cap aliança aèria que travessi els tres oceans de l'hemisferi sud (i Skyteam no en cobreix cap dels tres). Tanmateix, la Star Alliance ho cobreix tot excepte el Pacífic Sud des de Santiago de Chile a Tahití, que és un vol de LATAM Oneworld. Aquest vol no és l'única opció si voleu obviar el Pacífic Sud i la costa occidental de l'Amèrica del Sud. (vegeu a sota)
mt: If you want to circumnavigate the globe flying entirely in the southern hemisphere, your options for flights and destinations are limited by the lack of transoceanic routes. There is no airline alliance that crosses all three oceans of the southern hemisphere (and Skyteam doesn't cover any of the three). However, the Star Alliance covers everything except the South Pacific from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti, which is a flight on LATAM Oneworld. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Si vols fer la volta al món volant íntegrament per l'hemisferi sud, les opcions de vols i destinacions són limitades per la manca de rutes transoceàniques. No hi ha cap aliança aèria que travessi els tres oceans de l'hemisferi sud (i Skyteam no en cobreix cap dels tres). Tanmateix, la Star Alliance ho cobreix tot excepte el Pacífic Sud des de Santiago de Chile a Tahití, que és un vol de LATAM Oneworld. Aquest vol no és l'única opció si voleu obviar el Pacífic Sud i la costa occidental de l'Amèrica del Sud. (vegeu a sota)
mt: If you want to circumnavigate the globe flying entirely in the southern hemisphere, your options for flights and destinations are limited by the lack of transoceanic routes. There is no airline alliance that crosses all three oceans of the southern hemisphere (and Skyteam doesn't cover any of the three). However, the Star Alliance covers everything except the South Pacific from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti, which is a flight on LATAM Oneworld. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Internacionalment, hi ha gairebé 200 organitzacions turístiques en funcionament. La majoria d'aquestes operen de manera independent. El successor de Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours, connecta dotzenes de proveïdors de corredors a l'aire lliure a quatre continents. Amb arrels al Running Tours Barcelona de Barcelona i al Running Copenhagen de Copenhagen, s'hi uniren ràpidament el Running Tours Prague amb base a Praga i d'altres.
mt: There are almost 200 tour operators in operation internationally. Most of these operate independently. The successor to Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours, connects dozens of outdoor running providers on four continents. With roots in Running Tours Barcelona in Barcelona and Running Copenhagen in Copenhagen, they quickly joined Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Probablement els safaris siguin el principal atractiu turístic d'Àfrica i el més rellevant per a molts turistes. El terme safari en l'ús popular es refereix al viatge sobre terra per veure la fantàstica vida salvatge africana, especialment a la sabana. Alguns animals, com els elefants o les girafes, tendeixen a apropar-se als cotxes, i l'equipament estàndard permetrà unes bones vistes. Animals com els lleons, els guepards i els lleopards de tant en tant són tímids, i és per això que els podreu veure millor fent servir uns prismàtics. Un safari a peu (també anomenat ""caminada rural"", ""safari excursionista"" o fer ""footing"") consisteix a fer senderisme, bé unes poques hores o bé diversos dies."
mt: "Probably safaris are the main tourist attraction in Africa and the most relevant for many tourists. The term safari in popular use refers to the land journey to see the fantastic African wildlife, especially in the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants or giraffes, tend to approach cars, and standard equipment will allow good views. Animals such as lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy, and that's why you can see them better using binoculars. A walking safari (also called ""rural walk"", ""excursionist safari"" or ""footing"") consists of hiking, either a few hours or several days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Les visites són més econòmiques per a grups més grans, així que si us trobeu sol o només amb un amic, mireu d'ajuntar-vos amb altra gent i formar un grup de quatre a sis per a un preu per persona millor. Tanmateix, això no us hauria d'amoïnar gaire, perquè els turistes sovint es combinen per a omplir els cotxes. En realitat sembla més aviat una tècnica per a fer creure la gent que ha de pagar més.
mt: Visits are cheaper for larger groups, so if you find yourself alone or just with a friend, look to join up with other people and form a group of four to six for a better price per person. However, this shouldn't bother you too much, as tourists often combine to fill the cars. In fact, it seems more like a technique to make people think they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Tot i que l'economia de San Francisco té molt a veure amb el fet de ser una atracció turística a escala mundial, la seva economia està diversificada. Els sectors d'ocupació més extensos són els serveis professionals, l'administració, les finances, el comerç i el turisme. La seva freqüent representació en la música, les pel·lícules, la literatura i la cultura popular han ajudat a fer que la ciutat i els seus punts de referència siguin reconeguts arreu del món. San Francisco ha desenvolupat una gran infraestructura turística amb nombrosos hotels, restaurants i centres de convencions de primera categoria. San Francisco és, a més, un dels millors indrets del país on gaudir d'altres cuines asiàtiques: coreana, tailandesa, índia i japonesa.
mt: While San Francisco's economy is largely based on tourism, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, administration, finance, commerce, and tourism. Its frequent representation in music, film, literature, and popular culture have helped make the city and its landmarks known worldwide. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous high-quality hotels, restaurants, and convention centers. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country to enjoy other Asian cuisines: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Reservar amb antelació dona al viatger la tranquil·litat de saber que tindrà un lloc on dormir quan arribi a la seva destinació. Els agents de viatges sovint tenen acords amb hotels concrets, tot i que podeu reservar altres formes d'allotjament, com ara campaments, a través d'un agent de viatges. Els agents de viatges sovint ofereixen paquets que inclouen l'esmorzar, transport de/cap a l'aeroport o fins i tot paquets combinats amb vol i hotel. També us poden mantenir la reserva si us cal temps per a pensar en l'oferta o per a presentar altres documents per a la vostra destinació (com ara un visat). Qualsevol petició o suggeriment s'hauria d'enviar primer a l'agència de viatges i no a l'hotel.
mt: Reserving in advance gives the traveler the peace of mind of knowing that they will have a place to sleep when they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have agreements with specific hotels, although you can reserve other forms of lodging, such as campsites, through a travel agent. Travel agents often offer packages that include breakfast, transportation to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation if you need time to think about the offer or to present other documents for your destination (such as a visa). Any request or suggestion should be sent first to the travel agency and not to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Les aplicacions de traducció de text a temps real - aplicacions que poden traduir automàticament fragments de text sencers d'una llengua a una altra. Algunes aplicacions dins d'aquesta categoria fins i tot poden traduir textos en idiomes estrangers sobre rètols o altres objectes del món real quan l'usuari dirigeix el telèfon intel·ligent cap a aquests objectes. Els motors de traducció han millorat dràsticament, i en l'actualitat solen oferir traduccions més o menys correctes (i cada vegada menys galimaties), però sempre cal parar-hi atenció, perquè encara es poden equivocar. Una de les aplicacions més destacades en aquesta categoria és Google Translate, que permet traduir fora de línia un cop baixades les dades de l'idioma desitjat.
mt: Real-time text translation applications - applications that can automatically translate entire chunks of text from one language to another. Some applications within this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other real-world objects when the user directs the smartphone camera at these objects. Translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often offer translations that are more or less correct (and less and less gibberish), but always pay attention, because they can still make mistakes. One of the most prominent applications in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Les allaus no són un fet extraordinari; els pendents pronunciats només admeten una certa quantitat de neu, i un volum en excés es precipita en forma d'allaus. El problema és que la neu és enganxosa, per això necessita una empenta per a baixar i una mica de neu que baixi pot servir d'empenta per a la resta. De vegades, l'esdeveniment desencadenant és el sol que escalfa la neu, de vegades és més nevada, de vegades altres esdeveniments naturals, sovint un humà.
mt: Avalanches are not an extraordinary event; only steep slopes can hold a certain amount of snow, and an excess volume precipitates in the form of avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs a push to go down and a little snow that goes down can serve as a push for the rest. Sometimes the triggering event is the sun that warms the snow, sometimes it is more snowing, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: "Un curri és un plat a base d'herbes i espècies, juntament amb carn o verdures. El curri pot ser o bé ""sec"" o ""humit"" depenent de la quantitat de líquid. En les regions interiors del nord de l'Índia i el Pakistan, el iogurt sovint s'utilitza en curris; al sud de l'Índia i altres regions costaneres del subcontinent, la llet de coco és d'ús comú."
mt: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, with meat or vegetables. The curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is often used in curries; in southern India and other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: La Travessia del Pol Sud (o Autopista) és un sender de 1600 km des de l'estació de McMurdo al Mar de Ross fins el Pol. És neu compactada amb fissures emplenades i senyalades amb banderes. Només es pot travessar en tractors especialitzats, que arrosseguen trineus amb combustible i subministraments. No són molt àgils, per la qual cosa el camí ha de fer un llarg recorregut al voltant de les Muntanyes Transantàrtiques per arribar a l'altiplà.
mt: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on Ross Sea to the Pole. It is compacted snow with filled in cracks and marked with flags. It can only be crossed by specialized tractors that pull sleds with fuel and supplies. They are not very fast, so the trail has to make a long detour around the Transantarctic Mountains to reach the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Entrar a l'Àfrica del Sud en cotxe és una forma impressionant de veure tota la bellesa de la regió i d'arribar a llocs fora de les rutes turístiques més habituals. Això es pot fer en un cotxe normal amb una planificació acurada. Tot i això, és recomanable utilitzar un 4x4 i, de fet, moltes ubicacions només són accessibles amb un 4x4 de rodes elevades. Tingueu present, durant la planificació, que tot i que l'Àfrica meridional és estable, no tots els països veïns ho són. Els requeriments de visat i els costos varien de nació a nació i depenen del vostre país d'origen. A més, cada país té lleis específiques descrivint quins objectes d'emergència cal portar dins el cotxe.
mt: Entering South Africa by car is an impressive way to see all the beauty of the region and to get to places off the beaten tourist track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning. However, it is recommended to use a 4x4 and, in fact, many locations are only accessible with a 4x4 with raised wheels. Keep in mind, during planning, that while Southern Africa is stable, not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and depend on your country of origin. In addition, each country has specific laws describing what emergency items must be carried in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Entrar a l'Àfrica del Sud en cotxe és una forma impressionant de veure tota la bellesa de la regió i d'arribar a llocs fora de les rutes turístiques més habituals. Això es pot fer en un cotxe normal amb una planificació acurada. Tot i això, és recomanable utilitzar un 4x4 i, de fet, moltes ubicacions només són accessibles amb un 4x4 de rodes elevades. Tingueu present, durant la planificació, que tot i que l'Àfrica meridional és estable, no tots els països veïns ho són. Els requeriments de visat i els costos varien de nació a nació i depenen del vostre país d'origen. A més, cada país té lleis específiques descrivint quins objectes d'emergència cal portar dins el cotxe.
mt: Entering South Africa by car is an impressive way to see all the beauty of the region and to get to places off the beaten tourist track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning. However, it is recommended to use a 4x4 and, in fact, many locations are only accessible with a 4x4 with raised wheels. Keep in mind, during planning, that while Southern Africa is stable, not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and depend on your country of origin. In addition, each country has specific laws describing what emergency items must be carried in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Portar coses d'altri - Mai no perdis de vista les teves bosses, sobretot quan travessis fronteres internacionals. Us podeu trobar essent utilitzats com a transportadors de droga sense saber-ho, la qual cosa us portaria un gran munt de problemes. Això inclou esperar fent cua, en tant que es podrien fer servir gossos que oloren la droga en qualsevol moment sense previ avís. Alguns països tenen càstigs excessivament severs fins i tot per a primers delictes; poden implicar sentències de presó de més de deu anys o la mort. Les maletes desateses són un objectiu per als lladres i també poden cridar l'atenció de les autoritats cauteloses amb les amenaces de bomba.
mt: Bringing other people's stuff - Never lose sight of your bags, especially when crossing international borders. You may find yourself being used as drug mules without knowing it, which could get you into a lot of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as dogs can smell drugs at any time without prior notice. Some countries have excessively severe punishments even for first offenses; they can involve sentences of more than ten years or death. Unattended bags are a target for thieves and can also draw the attention of cautious authorities with bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
